text: here is tha femlie line o jesus christ tha sinn o davit an o abraham abraham wus tha faither o isaac isaac tha faither o jacob jacob tha faither o judah an his brithers
an judah wus tha faither o perez an zerah an thair mither wus tamar
perez wus tha faither o hezron hezron tha faither o ram
ram wus tha faither o amminadab amminadab tha faither o nahshon an nahshon tha faither o salmon
salmon wus tha faither o boaz an tha mither o boaz wus rahab
boaz wus tha faither o obed an tha mither o obed wus ruth
obed wus tha faither o jesse an jesse tha faither o king davit
davit wus tha faither o solomon bi hir that wus yinst tha wife o uriah
solomon wus tha faither o rehoboam rehoboam tha faither o abijah abijah tha faither o asa asa tha faither o jehoshaphat jehoshaphat tha faither o jehoram jehoram tha faither o uzziah
uzziah wus tha faither o jotham jotham tha faither o ahaz ahaz tha faither o hezekiah
hezekiah wus tha faither o manasseh manasseh tha faither o amon an amon tha faither o josiah
josiah wus tha faither o jeconiah an his brithers
that wus roon aboot tha time the wur cairriet aff tae babylon
an efter the wur cairriet awa tae babylon jeconiah becum tha faither o shealtiel an shealtiel tha faither o zerubbabel
zerubbabel wus tha faither o abiud abiud tha faither o eliakim an eliakim tha faither o azor
azor wus tha faither o zadok zadok tha faither o akim an akim tha faither o eliud
eliud wus tha faither o eleazar eleazar tha faither o matthan an matthan tha faither o jacob
an jacob wus tha faither o joseph an joseph wus merriet tae mary
an mary wus tha mither o jesus tha yin caad christ
that made fowerteen generations in aa frae abraham tae davit fowerteen frae davit til the wur cairriet awa tae babylon an anither fowerteen frae that tae tha cumin o christ
an this is hoo tha birth o jesus christ cum aboot his mither mary wus promist tae joseph but afore the cum thegither she fun oot she wus wi a wean
an it wus bi tha halie spirit
noo joseph hir husban wus a dacent man an he didnae want hir tae be affrontit sae he thocht tae senn hir awa on tha quait

he wus thinkin aboot aa this whan lo an behoul an angel o tha loard appeart tae him in a draim an saed joseph sinn o davit dinnae be feart tae tak mary fer yer wife fer tha wean shes cairryin is o tha halie spirit
she wull hae a sinn an ye ir tae gie him tha name jesus fer he wull save his ain fowk frae thair wrangdaeins
noo aa this wus daen tae bring aboot whut tha loard haed saed throu tha proaphit a virgin wull cairrie a wean a sinn an whan hes boarn hell be caad immanuel mainin god is wi iz
whaniver joseph waakent up he daen whut tha angel o tha loard haed toul him tae dae an he tuk mary hame fer tae be his wife
but he didnae sleep wi hir til efter tha wean wus boarn
an he caad him bi tha name jesus
efter jesus wus boarn in bethlehem in judea durin tha time that herod wus king spaemen frae tha east cum tae jerusalem an the axt whar is tha yin that haes bin boarn king o tha jews
fer we hae saen his starn in tha east an hae cum fer tae woarship him
whaniver king herod heerd this he wus baadlie put aboot an aa jerusalem wi him
sae he brocht thegither aa tha jewish fowks heid preeshts an maisters o tha laa an he axt thaim whar tha christ wus tae be boarn

in bethlehem o judea the saed fer this is whut tha proaphit writ but you bethlehem in tha lan o judah ye ir bi nae mains tha laist amang tha rulers o judah fer oot o you wull cum a ruler that wull herd ma fowk israel
then herod caad tha wise men thegither on tha quait an he fun oot frae thaim whan it wus that tha starn haed cum intae sicht
he sent thaim tae bethlehem an he toul thaim luk in iverie airt fer tha wean

as shuin as yis fin him wud ye bring me wurd sae as a can gae an woarship him as weel efter the haed heerd whut tha king haed tae say the set aff on thair wye an lo an behoul tha starn the haed saen in tha east went aheid o thaim til it stapt richt ower tha place whar tha wean wus
whaniver the saa tha starn the wur hairt gled
the cum intae tha hoose the saen tha wee wean wi his mither mary an the bood doon an wurshipt him
then the apent thair kists an the set afore him thair gifts o gowld an frankincense an myrrh
an bein warnt in a draim no tae gae bak tae herod the tuk anither road bak hame
an efter the went awa an angel o tha loard appeart tae joseph in a draim
git up he toul him tak aff tae egypt wi tha wean an his mither
bide thair til a gie ye tha wurd fer herod is aboot tae hunt oot tha wean fer tae dae awa wi him
sae up joseph got he tuk tha wean an his mither wi him in tha middle o tha nicht an he set aff fer egypt
he stapt thair til herod deed
an aa this brocht aboot whut tha loard haed saed throu tha proaphit oot o egypt a hae caad ma sinn

whaniver herod fun oot hed bin haad he wus rippin an he gien oarders fer tae kill aa tha weechils in bethlehem an roon aboot thaim at wus twa yeir oul an unner takkin intae accoont tha time he haed bin telt bi tha spaemen
then whut tha proaphit jeremiah saed aforehan wud happen cum aboot a voice wus heerd in ramah greetin an lamentin
it wus rachel greetin fer hir weans an she niver devalved acause hir weans wus nae langr wi hir

but whaniver herod deed lo an behoul an angel o tha loard appeart in a draim tae joseph in egypt an he saed git up tak tha wean an his mither awa tae tha lan o israel fer tha yins that wus gaun tae kill tha wean is deid
sae joseph upt an tuk tha wean an his mither an he went intae tha lan o israel
but whan he heerd that archelaus wus tha king o judea in tha ruim o his faither herod he wus feart tae gae thair
bein warnt in a draim he pued bak tae tha district o galilee an he went an settelt doon in a toon caad nazareth
an sae it cum tae pass whut wus saed bi tha proaphits he wull be caad a nazarene
in thaim days jhone tha baptiser cum praichin in tha wiles o judea an sayin turn awa frae yer sins fer tha kingdom o heiven is nearhan

jhone is tha yin tha proaphit isaiah spauk aboot tellin thairs a voice cryin oot in tha wiles mak tha wye readie fer tha loard mak his pads strecht fer him jhones claes wus made o kemels hair an he haed a leather belt roon his middle
an he leeved bi aitin gresshoppers an wile honey
croods gaed oot tae him frae jerusalem alang wi aa tha fowk frae judea an tha hale district o tha river joardan
an thaim at confesst thair sins wur baptised bi him in tha joardan river
but whan he saa a wheen o pharisees an sadducees cumin tae whar he wus baptisin he saed tae thaim ye sleekit shooer o vipers wha telt ye tae rin frae tha wrath o god thats cumin
ye maun show bi tha wye ye leeve that ye hae turnt awa frae yer sins
an dinnae be thinkin tae yersels we hae abraham fer oor faither an hae daen wi that
a tell ye that oot o thon stanes god can mak weans fer abraham
gods hatchit is noo at tha ruit o tha trees an thaim that dinnae gie guid fruit wull be fellt an pitcht intae tha fire
am baptisin yis wi watter fer tae show yis hae repentit
but thairs yin cumin efter me that is michtier ner me
am no fit tae cairrie his buits
he wull baptise ye wi tha halie spirit an wi fire
his winnowin fork is in his han an he wull redd up his thrashinflure getherin his wheat intae his barn an burnin tha caff wi a fire ye cannae pit oot
then jesus cum frae galilee tae tha joardan fer tae be baptised bi jhone
but jhone tried tae pit him aff sayin its me that needs tae be baptised bi you an you ir cumin tae me
jesus saed jist dae this fer noo fer this is tha richt thing fer iz tae dae tae cairrie oot tha wull o god
sae jhone gien in
tha minit jesus wus baptised he ris up oot o tha watter an jist wi that tha heivens apent an he saa tha spirit o god cumin doon laik a doo an lichtin on him
an a voice cum frae heiven sayin this is ma sinn ma hairts delicht am weel plaised wi him
then jesus wus taen bi tha spirit intae tha wulderness fer tae be tempit bi tha deil
efter gaun wioot mait fer fowertie days an fowertie nichts he wus gye hungrie
tha tempter cum tae him an saed if ye ir tha sinn o god tell thaim thair stanes tae turn intae breid
jesus saed bak tae him it is writ man cannae leeve bi breid alane but bi iverie wurd at cums frae tha mooth o god
then tha deil tuk him tae tha halie citie an stud him up on tha verie tap o tha hoose o god
if ye ir tha sinn o god saed he throw yersel doon fer tha guid buik says he wull tell his angels tae luk efter ye an wi thair hans the wull haud ye up fer fear ye dunt yer fit agin a stane
jesus saed bak tae him its in tha buik forbye ye ir no tae temp tha loard yer god
an nixt thing tha deil tuk him tae a big heich muntin an lut him see aa tha kingdoms o tha warl in aa thair glorie
a wull gie ye aa this he saed if yell jist boo doon an woarship me
jesus saed tae him awa or that satan fer it is writ doon ye ir tae woarship tha loard yer god an tae sarve naebodie but him
then tha deil lut him be an angels cum an lukt efter him
noo whan jesus heerd tha wittins that jhone haed bin put in jail he went bak intae galilee
an efter leain nazareth he gaed tae capernaum an he stapt thair

capernaum wus bi tha loch in tha district o zebulun an naphtali tae bring aboot whut wus foretoul bi tha proaphit isaiah in tha lan o zebulun an tha lan o naphtali on tha wye tae tha loch on tha ither side o tha joardan in galilee whar tha gentiles leeve tha fowk that sut in tha dairk hae saa a bricht licht an on tha yins leevin in tha lan o tha shedda o deith tha licht haes cum in
frae then on jesus begun tae praich turn awa frae yer sins fer tha kingdom o heiven haes cum nearhan ye
yin day whan jesus wus waakin alang tha loch shore o galilee he saa twa brithers simon caad peter an his brither andra
the wur castin a neyt intae tha watter fer the wrocht at tha fishin
cum an follae me jesus saed an a wull mak ye fishers o men
an richt awa the layed doon thair neyts an the follaed efter him
he gan on frae thair an saen twa ither brithers jeames tha sinn o zebedee an his brither jhone
the wur in a boat wi thair faither zebedee mennin thair neyts
jesus caad thaim an richt awa the left tha boat an thair faither an the follaed him
jesus trevelt aa roon galilee taichin in thair meetin hooses an praichin tha guid wittins o tha kingdom an curin iverie disaise an ailment amang tha fowk

wurd aboot him spreed aa ower syria an the brocht tae him aa tha seeck fowk wi aa kines o disaises thaim that wus tormentit or bothert wi ill spirits or tuk fits or fowk that wus paralysed an he made thaim better
big croods follaed him frae galilee an tha ten toons an jerusalem an judea an tha district on tha ither side o tha river joardan
noo whaniver he saa tha croods he gaed up tha muntin an sut doon
his follaers gethert roon him an he stairtit tae taich thaim sayin blisst ir tha puir in spirit fer thairs is tha kingdom o heiven
blisst ir tha yins that greet fer the wull be comfortit
blisst ir tha yins that ir gentle fer the wull inherit tha irth
blisst ir tha yins that hae a hungr an a druith fer whuts richt fer the wull get thair fill
blisst ir tha yins that ir merciefu fer the wull be showed mercie
blisst ir tha pure in hairt fer the wull see god
blisst ir tha yins that warks fer peace fer the wull be caad sinns o god
blisst ir tha yins thats traitit ill fer daein whuts richt fer thairs is tha kingdom o heiven
blisst ir you whan fowks baadmooth ye an trait ye ill an miscaa ye on accoont o me
be joyfu an gled acause yis hae a pooerfu reward waitin fer ye in heiven fer the illtraitit tha proaphits that wus thair afore ye in jist tha same wye
yous ir tha saut o tha irth
but if tha saut loasses its taste hoo can it git bak its tang
it is nae langr onie use but fer tae be throwed oot an thrampt unner fit
yous ir tha licht o tha warl
a toon bigged on a hill cannae be hid
ye dinnae licht a lamp an pit it unner a boul
na ye pit it on a stan whar it gies licht tae tha hale hoose
in tha same wye let yer licht shine afore iveriebodie sae as the wull see yer guid warks an gie glorie tae yer faither in heiven
dinnae be thinkin that a hae cum fer tae dae awa wi tha laa or tha proaphits a hinnae cum fer tae dae awa wi thaim but fer tae fulfill thaim
a tell ye tha truith afore heiven an irth passes awa no tha weeest letter ner even tha weeest stroke o a pen wull pass awa frae tha laa afore iveriethin god wants fer it is brocht aboot

oniebodie that breks yin o these commauns even tha laist o thaim an lairns ithers tae dae tha same wull be laist thocht o in tha kingdom o heiven but whaiver keeps these commauns an lairns ithers tae dae thaim wull be gye weel thocht o in tha kingdom o heiven

fer am tellin yis this less yer guidness gaes beyont that o tha pharisees an tha maisters o tha laa yisll no git intae tha kingdom o heiven thats fer shair yis hae heerd that it wus saed tae fowk lang syne dinnae commit murder an oniebodie that murders wull be judged fer it
but am tellin ye oniebodie thats even angrie wi his brither wioot onie caas is gaun tae be judged fer it
agane oniebodie that says tae his brither ye eejit ye that bodie wull hae tha heich cooncil tae answer tae
an oniebodie that says ye oul fool wull be rinnin tha risk o hell fire
sae if ye ir bringin yer offerin tae tha althar an ye mine that yer brither haes ocht agin ye jist lea it doon fornent tha althar
awa an mak it up wi yer brither furst then cum bak an gie yer offerin in
soart things oot quick wi yer enemie that is takkin ye tae coort
dae it while ye ir still wi him on tha wye thair or hell mebbe han ye ower tae tha judge an tha judge cud han ye ower tae tha offysher an ye cud be cloddit intae jail
a tell ye tha truith yell no git oot o thair afore yer last pennies pyed yis hae heerd that it wus saed dinnae commit adulterie
but am tellin yis that oniebodie that even luks at a wumman wi lust haes aareadie commitit adulterie wi hir in his hairt
if yer richt ee maks ye dae wrang hoke it oot an clod it awa
its faur better fer ye tae loass tha yin pairt o yer bodie ner fer yer hale bodie tae be throwed intae hell
an if yer richt han maks ye dae wrang cut it aff an clod it awa
its faur better fer ye tae loass tha yin pairt o yer bodie ner fer yer hale bodie tae gang intae hell
its bin saed in tha scriptures as weel oniebodie that divorces his guidwife maun gie hir a notysh o divorce
but am tellin ye that oniebodie that pits awa his wife fer ocht ither ner rinnin aff wi anither man he maks hir an adulteress an oniebodie that merries a divorced wumman commits adulterie as weel
forbye ye ken that it wus saed tae tha fowk lang syne dinnae brek yer oath but keep tha oaths ye hae made tae tha loard
am tellin ye but dinnae sweer ava ether bi heiven fer it is gods throne or bi tha irth fer it is his fitcreepie or bi jerusalem fer it is tha citie o tha michtie king
an dinnae sweer bi yer heid fer ye cannae mak even yin o yer hairs white or blek
jist let yer ay be ay an yer na na oniethin mair ner this cums frae tha wickit yin
yis hae heerd that it wus saed an ee fer an ee an a tuith fer a tuith
but a tell ye dinnae fecht agin a wickit bodie if summodie hits ye on tha richt cheek turn tha ither side til him forbye
an if summodie wants tae sue ye an tak tha shirt aff yer bak let him hae yer tapcoat as weel
if summodie gars ye tae gang yin mile gang twa mile wi him
gie tae tha yin that axes ye fer ocht an dinnae turn yer bak on a bodie thats lukkin tha lenn o sumthin
yis hae heerd that it wus saed love yer nighber an hait yer enemie
but a tell ye love yer enemies an pray fer thaim that traits ye ill that ye micht be childer o yer faither in heiven
he maks his sin tae rise on tha wickit as weel as on tha guid an he senns rain on thaim that daes whuts richt as weel as on tha yins that daesnae
if ye jist love thaim at loves you whut reward wull ye get
shair even tha tex men daes that an if ye onlie pass tha time o day wi yer ain yins whut ir ye daein mair ner ithers
even pagans daes tha same dae the no
but you maun be perfait jist as yer heivenlie faither is perfait
dinnae mak a show afore fowk o onie guid yis dae fer yer faither in heiven wull gie yis nae reward fer that
sae whan ye gie ocht tae tha needie dinnae soon tha trumpet tha wye tha hippycrates daes in tha meetin hooses an on tha streets fer tae be weel thocht o
a tell ye tha truith the hae got aa tha reward their gaun tae get
but whan ye gie ocht tae tha needie dinnae let yer left han ken whut yer richt han is daein sae that yer giein micht be on tha quait
then yer faither that sees whut is daen on tha quait wull reward ye
an whan yis pray dinnae be laik tha hippycrates fer the love tae stan an pray in tha meetin hooses an on tha street coarners fer aa tae see
a tell ye tha truith the hae got aa their gaun tae get
but whan you pray gang awa intae a ruim alane shut tha dure an pray tae yer faither in saicret
then yer faither at sees whut is daen in saicret wull reward ye
an whan ye pray dinnae keep rhymin on an on laik pagans fer they think tha mair the taak tha better the wull be heerd
dinnae be laik thaim fer yer faither kens whut ye hae need o afore ye ax him
sae this is hoo ye shud pray oor faither that bides abain halie be yer name
micht yer kingdom cum shuin an yer wull be daen on irth jist tha wye it is abain
gie iz theday eneuch breid tae dae iz
an forgie iz oor debts jist as we hae forgien tha yins thats in debt tae us

an dinnae road iz intae temptation but save iz frae tha wickit yin fer yours is tha kingdom tha pooer an tha glorie fer iver an iver amen fer if you forgie fowk whan the dae wrang agin ye then yer heivenlie faither wull forgie you as weel
but if ye dinnae forgie fowk thair wrangdaeins yer faither wull no forgie you tha wrangs yous hae daen
whan ye fast dinnae luk doon in tha mooth as tha hippycrates dae fer the mak thair faces luk miserable jist tae let fowk see ther fastin
a tell ye tha truith this is aa tha reward ther gaun tae get

but whan ye fast pit oiyle on yer heid an waash yer face sae fowk wull no notysh that ye ir fastin yer faither but wha ye cannae see wull notysh an tha yin that sees whut is daen in hidlins he wull gie ye yer reward
dinnae hoord up fer yersels treysures on irth whar moths an roost desthroy an whar thiefs brek in an steal
but hoord up fer yersels treysures in heiven whar nether moth ner roost can desthroy ner thiefs brek in an steal
fer whut ye think tha maist o wull aye be in yer hairt
yer ee is tha lamp o tha bodie
if yer ee is guid yer hale bodie is fu o licht
but if yer ee is baad yer hale bodie is fu o dairkness
if then tha licht wiin ye is dairkness it maun be pitch blek naebodie can sarve twa maisters fer ether hell hait tha yin an love tha ither or hell stick bye tha yin an think naethin o tha ither
ye cannae sarve baith god an gowld
sae am tellin ye tak nae thocht fer yer life whut yell ait or whut yell drink ner yit aboot yer bodie whut claes yell pit on ye
is life no mair impoartin ner mait an tha bodie mair impoartin ner claes
luk at tha burds o tha air the dinnae sow ner reap ner hoord awa in barns an yit yer heivenlie faither feeds thaim
ir yous no warth faur mair ner thaim
ye cannae add a singl oor tae yer life bi worryin aboot it
an why dae ye worrie aboot tha claes ye pit on ye
luk hoo tha lilies o tha fiel growe

they nether wark ner spin yit all tell ye this een solomon cudnae match thaim wi aa his fancie claes an if that is tha wye god pits claes on tha gress o tha fiel thats here theday an throwed intae tha fire themorra dae you dooters no unnerstan that hell luk efter you anaa
sae dinnae fash yersels bi sayin whut wull we ait
or whut wull we drink
or whut wull we pit on iz
fer thaim at daesnae know god rin efter aa these things but yer heivenlie faither kens aa ye hae need o
seek oot his kingdom an his righteousness furst o aa an aa these ither things wull tak care o thairsels
sae dinnae fash yersels aboot themorra fer themorra wull luk efter itsel
iverie day haes eneuch bother o its ain
dinnae judge ithers sae as yell no be judged yersels
fer in tha same wye yis judge ithers yisll be judged that wye yersels an tha misure yis gie wull be tha misure yis get
an why dae ye see tha skelf in yer brithers ee but ye dinnae see tha plenk in yer ain ee
hoo can ye say tae yer brither let me tak tha skelf oot o yer ee whan luk aa tha time thair is a plenk in yer ain ee

ye oul hippycrate ye pu tha plenk oot o yer ain ee furst an then yell be able tae see proper tae tak tha skelf oot o yer brithers ee dinnae gie whuts halie tae tha doags an dinnae scatter yer pearls afore pigs
if ye dae the may thramp thaim unner thair feet an then turn an teer ye tae bits
keep on axin an it wull be gien tae ye keep on lukkin an yell fin whut yer efter keep on rappin an tha dure wull be apent tae ye
fer iveriebodie that axes wull get him that keeps on lukkin wull fin whut hes efter an tae him that keeps on rappin tha dure wull be apent
whutch faither amang ye if his sinn axes him fer breid wull gie him a stane
or if he axes him fer a fish wull he gie him a snake

an sae if sinfu fowk laik yersels know hoo tae gie guid things tae yer weans hoo much mair wull yer faither in heiven gie guid things tae thaim that axes him sae in iveriethin dae tae ithers whut yis wud want thaim tae dae tae yersels fer this is whut tha laa an tha proaphits is aa aboot
gae in bi tha nerra gate
fer wide is tha gate an braid is tha road that leads tae destruction an monies a yin gaes that wye
but nerra is tha gate an reuch tha rodden that leads tae life an thairs no monie that fins it
watch oot fer fauss proaphits
the cum tae ye lukkin laik hairmless sheep but on tha inside ther naethin but a paak o wolfs
yell ken thaim bi thair fruit ay bi whut the dae
daes fowk gether grapes frae a thoarn bush or figs frae thristles
na in tha same wye iverie guid tree gies guid fruit but a baad tree gies ye baad fruit
a guid tree cannae gie baad fruit an a baad tree cannae gie ye guid fruit
iverie tree that daesnae gie guid fruit is cut doon an throwed intae tha fire
its laik that wi tha fauss proaphits tae
yell ken thaim bi whut the dae
its no iverie yin that says tae me loard loard thatll git intae tha kingdom o heiven but its onlie him that daes tha wull o ma faither wha is in heiven
monies a yinll say tae me on tha day o reckonin loard loard did we no proaphesy in yer name an in yer name did we no drive oot ill spirits an dae a hale lock o miracles
then a wull tell thaim strecht a niver knowed ye
awa frae me ye wrangdaers sae iverie yin that hears these wurds o mine an heeds thaim is laik a wise man that bigged his hoose on a roak
tha rain cum doon tha watter ris an tha wuns got up an hut agin tha hoose yit it didnae faa acause it wus bigged on tha roak
but iverie yin that hears these wurds o mine an daesnae heed thaim is laik a gormless man that bigged his hoose on san
tha rain cum doon tha watter ris an tha wuns blattert an bate agin thon hoose o his

tha hoose faad doon an whut a cresh thair wus whan jesus haed daen sayin these things tha croods wur aa thunnerstruck wi his taichin fer he taicht thaim laik a bodie wi thortie an no laik thair maisters o tha laa
whaniver jesus cum doon frae tha braeside big croods follaed him
an here cum up this man wi leprosie an he got doon on his knees afore him an saed loard if ye hae a mine tae ye can mak me clain
an jesus put his han oot an toucht tha man
am wullin he saed
be clain an richt awa he wus cured o his leprosie
then jesus saed tae him luk here mine ye dinnae tell oniebodie
but gang awa an show yersel tae tha preesht

gie an offerin fer yer cleansin as moses toul iz in tha laa fer a wutness tae yin an aa that yer weel agane whan jesus wus gaun intae capernaum a centurion cum tae him plaidin wi him an sayin loard ma sarvin man is lyin on his bed at hame
hes no weel an cannae move ava
hes sufferin sumthin tarrible jesus saed tae him weel am cumin tae mak him better
tha centurion saed loard tha laiks o mes no fit tae hae ye cum unner ma ruif
but jist say tha wurd an ma sarvin man wull be better agane
fer a ken hoo tae tak oarders an a hae sodgers unner me as weel
a tell yin tae gang an he gangs an anither yin tae cum an he cums

a tell ma sarvin man tae dae this or that an he daes it whan jesus heerd this he wus stoondit an saed tae thaim that follaed him a tell ye tha truith a niver fun oniebodie wi sitch faith in aa israel a say tae ye that monie fowk wull cum frae tha east an tha wast an the wull tak thair place roon tha boord wi abraham isaac an jacob in tha kingdom o heiven
but monie o tha yins tha kingdom wus got readie fer the wull be cast oot intae tha dairk whar thair wull be greetin an scringein o teeth
then jesus saed tae tha centurion gae it wull be daen fer ye tha wye ye believed it wud
an his sarvint got better agane that verie minit
noo whaniver jesus cum intae peters hoose he saen peters mitherinlaa lyin in bed wi a faivir
he toucht hir han an tha faivir left hir an she got up an stairtit tae sarve an luk efter him
an that evenin the brocht tae him a hale lock o fowk that wur bothert wi ill spirits an he driv oot tha spirits wi a wurd an cured aa that wus seeck
this wus fer tae bring aboot whut wus spauk throu tha proaphit isaiah he tuk oor ailments on hissel an he cairriet oor disaises
noo whan jesus saa tha thrang gethert roon him he toul his follaers tae gang ower tae tha ither side o tha loch

then thair wus this maister o tha laa cum up an saed maister a wull follae ye nae metter whar yer gaun an jesus saed tae him foxes hae holes an burds hae nests but tha sinn o man haes naewhar he can caa hame
anither o his follaers saed tae him loard let me gang an burie ma faither furst
but jesus saed bak tae him follae me an let tha deid burie thair ain deid
then he got intae tha boat his follaers got in efter him an awa the went
wioot onie warnin a wile stoarm cum up on tha loch an tha waves waasht ower tha boat
but jesus slep throu it
his follaers cum an waakent him sayin loard save iz or well aa be droont hoo cum yis ir sae feart
saed he
hae yis nae faith ava
then he stud up an chackt tha wun an tha waves an it wus aa peace an quaitness
tha men wur dumfoonert an axt whut kine o a man is this
tha verie wun an tha waves daes his biddin an whan he got tae tha ither side o tha loch tae tha lan whar tha gadarenes leeved thair wus these twa men cum oot frae tha graveyaird fer tae meet him
the wur bothert wi ill spirits an that reuch naebodie cud get bye thaim
whut is it ye ir efter wi us sinn o god
the guldert
hae ye cum here tae torment iz afore tha day o reckonin
a bit awa frae thaim a big herd o pigs wus hokin fer food
an tha ill spirits plaidit wi jesus gin ye ir gaun tae drive iz oot jist senn iz intae tha herd o pigs thonner
he saed tae thaim awa wi ye sae the cum oot o tha men an gaed intae tha pigs an aa tha herd tuk aff doon tha hill heid furst intae tha loch an tha hale lock o thaim deed in tha watter
tha yins lukkin efter tha pigs run aff the gaed intae tha toon an toul iveriebodie aa that haed tuk place an whut haed happent tae tha men bothert wi ill spirits
then tha hale toon gaed oot tae meet jesus
an whan the saen him the plaidit wi him tae lea thair pairt o tha kintrie
jesus climmed intae a boat sailed ower tha ither side an cum tae his ain toon
the brocht a paralysed man tae him lyin on a bed
an whaniver jesus saa tha faith the haed he saed tae tha paralysed man tak hairt sinn yer sins is aa forgien
at this some o tha maisters o tha laa saed amang thairsels thats naethin but blesphemie knowin whut the wur thinkin jesus saed hoo cum yis hae sitch wickit thochts in yer hairt
is it aisier tae say yer sins is forgien ye or tae say get up an waak
but jist sae as yell ken tha sinn o man haes tha pooer tae forgie sins here on irth
he then saed tae tha paralysed man up ye get lift yer bed an gae hame
an tha man stud up sae he did an he went awa hame
whan tha thrang saen this the wur fillt wi wunnerment an the gien glorie tae god fer giein sitchana thortie tae a man
whan jesus wus trevelin on frae thair he saa a tex man bi tha name o mattha sittin in his hut
follae me he toul him an mattha ris up an follaed him
a while later whan jesus wus at a denner at matthas hoose thair wus a hale lock o tex men an ither fowk o ill repute aitin alang wi him an his follaers
whaniver tha pharisees saen this the axt his follaers whuts yer maister daein aitin wi thaim tex men an sinners
on hearin this jesus saed it is no thaim thats weel needs a docter but thaim thats seeck
but awa an lairn tha mainin o this scripture its mercie am efter am no efter secryfice
fer a hinnae cum fer tae caa tha guid fowk tae repent a hae cum fer tae caa sinners
an it wus then that jhones follaers cum up an axt him hoo is it that tha pharisees an us ir aye fastin but your follaers dinnae fast
jesus saed bak tae thaim dae ye think tha waddin guests wud murn while tha bridegruim is still wi thaim
thairll cum a day but whaniver tha bridegruim wull be tuk awa frae thaim an its then thell be fastin
naebodie patches thair oul duds wi a bit o new claith fer tha patchll pu awa an mak it waur
nether wud the poor new wine intae oul wineskins
fer if the dae tha skins wull brust tha wine wull rin oot an tha wineskins wull be ruint
na the poor new wine intae new wineskins an tha baith o thaim wull keep
noo whaniver he wus sayin this a heidyin o tha meetin hoose cum an got doon on his knees afore him an saed ma wee dochter haes deed jist thair noo
but cum an pit yer han on hir an shell cum bak tae life
an jesus got up an gaed wi him as weel as his follaers
an lo an behoul thair wus this wumman that wus bothert wi bleedin fer twal yeir
she cum up behin him an toucht tha enn o his cloke
fer saed she til hirsel if a can jist touch his cloke a wull be made weel agane
jesus turnt roon an saen hir
tak hairt dochter dear he saed yer faith haes made ye weel
an tha wumman wus hailt that verie minit
noo whan jesus cum tae tha hame o tha heidyin o tha meetin hoose he saa tha funeral fluters an aa tha hale thrang foofin an greetin an he saed awa er that tha wee lass is no deid shes jist sleepin
but the begun tae lach at him
efter tha crood wus put oot tha dure jesus gaed in an tuk tha wee lass bi tha han an she ris tae hir feet
an this wus aa tha taak o that hale kintrieside

as jesus gaed on frae thair twa blin men follaed him caain oot sinn o davit tak peetie on iz whaniver he went intae his hoose tha blin men cum in tae an he axt thaim dae yis believe a hae tha pooer fer tae dae whut yer wantin
ay loard the saed we dae
then he toucht thair een an saed itll be daen tae ye accoardin tae yer faith
an thair sicht cum bak an the cud see jesus gien thaim a guid warnin an saed luk here dinnae you be tellin oniebodie aboot this
but nae shuiner wur the oot than the stairtit tae spreed tha news aboot him aa roon tha hale kintrie
an efter the left a man that wus bothert wi ill spirits an cudnae spake wus brocht tae jesus
an jesus driv oot tha ill spirit sae tha man that wus dum cud noo spake

tha crood o fowk wus dumfoonert an saed we niver saen tha laiks o this in israel afore but tha pharisees saed its tha deil tha heidyin o tha ill spirits that gies him tha pooer tae cast oot ill spirits an jesus trevelt throu aa tha toons an villages taichin in thair meetin hooses praichin tha guid news o tha kingdom an hailin iverie kine o disaise an ailment
whaniver he saen tha croods his hairt went oot tae thaim acause the wur aa laik sheep wi nae shepherd troublet on thair lane wi nae road tae turn
then he saed tae his follaers thairs a gran hairst waitin but thairs no monie warkers tae gether it in
sae keep on axin tha loard o tha hairst tae senn oot mair warkers intae his hairvest fiel
he caad his twal follaers thegither an he gien thaim tha pooer tae drive oot ill spirits an tae cure aa kines o disaises an ailments

tha names o tha twal possels wus furst simon caad peter an his brither andra then jeames tha sinn o zebedee an his brither jhone philip an bartholomew tammas an mattha tha tex man jeames tha sinn o alphaeus an thaddaeus simon tha zealot an judas iscariot tha yin that bethrayed jesus
an jesus sent oot tha twal o thaim an gien thaim thair oarders dinnae be gaun amang tha gentiles or intae onie toon o tha samaritans
but rether gae tae tha loast sheep o israel
an as ye ir gaun alang praich this tha kingdom o heiven is nearhan
heal seeck fowk rise tha deid cleanse thaim wi leprosie drive oot ill spirits
ye hae freelie received sae ye maun gie freelie
dinnae tak alang onie gowld or siller ner een a copper in yer girthpooch tak nae baag fer tha road ner spare claes ner shune ner a stav fer tha warker is warth his keep
whutiver toon or village ye gae intae luk fer some warthie dacent bodie thair an stap ower at his hoose til ye tak yer lave o tha place
as ye gae intae this hame or that bid thaim tha time o day
if tha hame is warthie let yer blissin be on it if it isnae warthie let yer blissin cum bak tae ye
if the dinnae mak yis walcum or gie yis a hearin dicht tha stour aff yer feet whan ye lea that hame or toon
a tell ye tha truith tha fowk o sodom an gomorrah wull be better aff on tha day o reckonin ner that toon
am sennin yis oot laik sheep amang wolfs
sae be as cannie as sarpents an as hairmless as doos
be on yer gaird agin men thell han yis ower tae tha cooncils an gie yis a guid whuppin in thair meetin hooses
on accoont o me yell be brocht afore guviners an kings as wutnesses tae thaim an tae tha gentiles
but whaniver yis ir liftit an brocht tae thrial dinnae be ower enxious aboot whut tae say or hoo tae say it
yell be gien tha richt wurds at tha richt time
fer itll no be you thats spakin but tha spirit o yer faither spakin throu ye
brithers wull han ower thair brithers tae be killt an faithers thair weans an weans wull rise up agin thair faithers an mithers an hae thaim put tae deith as weel
yell be haitit bi yin an aa on accoont o me but he that tholes tae tha enn wull be saved
whan yis ir persecutit in yin place fly tae anither
a tell ye tha truith yell no hae feenished gaun throu aa tha toons o israel afore tha sinn o man cums bak a follaer is no abain his taicher ner a sarvint abain his maister
whut mair can tha follaer ax than tae be laik his taicher or tha sarvint tae be laik his maister
gin the hae caad tha heid o tha hoose beelzebul weel whut wull the no caa aa tha yins o his hoosehold sae dinnae be afeart o thaim
thairs naethin covert ower thatll no cum tae licht ner hid thatll no be kent
whut a tell ye in tha dairk spake oot in tha braid daylicht whuts whuspert in yer ear blare it oot frae tha ruiftaps
dinnae be feart o thaim that kill tha bodie but cannae kill tha sowl
rether be afeart o tha yin that can desthroy baith bodie an sowl in hell
ir twa wee sparras no soul fer a pennie
yit no yin o thaim wull faa tae tha grun wioot yer faither knowin it
fer tha verie hairs o yer heid ir aa coontit
sae dinnae be feart yis ir warth mair ner a hale wheen o sparras
whaivers no feart tae own me afore men a wull own him tae afore ma faither in heiven
but whaiver disowns me afore men a wull disown him afore ma faither in heiven
dinnae be thinkin a hae cum tae bring peace tae tha irth
na a didnae cum tae bring peace but a sword
fer a hae cum tae turn a man agin his faither a dochter agin hir mither a dochterinlaa agin hir mitherinlaa itll be tha yins leevin wi a man that wull be agin him
oniebodie that loves his faither or his mither mair ner me is no warthie o me nether is tha yin that loves his sinn or his dochter mair ner me warthie o me
an oniebodie that daesnae tak up his cross an follae me is no warthie o me
whaiver fins his life wull loass it an whaiver loasses his life on accoont o me wull fin it
him that walcums you walcums me an him that walcums me walcums tha yin that sent me

oniebodie that maks a proaphit walcum on accoont o his bein a proaphit wull be gien a proaphits reward an oniebodie that maks a guid man walcum on accoont o bein a guid man wull git a guid mans reward
an if oniebodie gies even a bicker o coul watter tae yin o these weans acause he is ma follaer a tell ye he wull no be wantin fer a reward thats fer shair
efter jesus haed daen giein oarders tae his twal follaers he gaed on frae thair tae taich an praich in tha toons roon aboot
noo jhone wus in jail an whaniver he heerd whut christ wus daein he sent twa o his follaers an the axt him ir you tha yin that wus supposed tae cum or shud we be lukkin oot fer some ither bodie
jesus toul thaim gae bak an gie jhone an accoont o whut ye hear an see
blin fowk can see noo lameters can waak fowk wi leprosie ir made weel
deef fowk can hear
tha deid leeve agane
an tha guid news is praicht tae tha puir
an blisst is tha yin that daesnae misdoot me
as jhones follaers wur leain jesus stairtit tae taak tae tha croods aboot him whut did yis gang oot intae tha wulderness fer tae see
wus it tae see tha rushes sweein in tha wun
if no whut did ye think ye wud see oot thair
a man aa rigged oot in fancie claes
na tha yins in fancie claes its in kings palaces ye wull fin them
sae whut did yis gae oot fer tae see
wus it a proaphit
ay a tell ye an faur mair ner a proaphit
this is tha yin tha scriptures taak aboot whan the say listen a wull senn oot ma messenger aheid o ye he wull mak readie tha wye afore ye
a tell ye tha truith amangst thaim boarn o a wumman naebodie haes iver leeved thats mair impoartin ner jhone tha baptiser yit tha yin that is laist in tha kingdom o heiven is a better man ner him
frae tha time jhone tha baptiser stairtit tae praich up til noo fowk ir tryin tae push thair wye intae tha kingdom o heiven an violent men ir takkin houl o it
fer up tae jhones time aa tha proaphits an tha laa foretoul whut wus tae happen
an if ye ir wullin tae believe whut a say jhone is tha elijah that wus tae cum
let him that haes ears in his heid tak tent whut can a say aboot tha fowk nooadays
the ir laik weans sittin doon at tha mairket an caain oot tae tha ithers we played tha whustle fer ye an ye wudnae daunce we sung a dirge tae ye an ye wudnae greet
fer jhone wusnae intae aitin ner drinkin whan he cum an the say thairs a baad spirit in him

yit tha sinn o man cum aitin an drinkin an the say wud ye luk at him hes a glutton an hes tarrible fand o tha drink sae he is tha freen o tex men an wrangdaers but daein whuts richt proves tha wusdom o gods wyes
then jesus stairtit tae tak tae task tha cities whar he haed daen tha maist o his miracles acause the didnae repent
sorra tae chorazim an sorra tae bethsaida fer if tha fowk o tyre an sidon haed saen tha warkin o gods pooer as yous hae saen it the wud hae repentit lang syne in seckclaith an eshes
but am tellin ye tha fowk o tyre an sidon wull be better aff on tha day o reckonin than yous wull
an capernaum you micht think yer weel on yer wye tae heiven
na but am tellin ye yell be brocht doon tae hell fer if tha miracles that wus daen in you haed bin daen in sodom it wud be thair tae this day
but a tell ye that sodom wull be better aff on tha day o reckonin ner you
at that time jesus saed faither loard o heiven an irth a praise ye that ye hae kep these things frae clivir an warliewise fowk an made thaim clear eneuch fer weans tae unnerstan
ay faither it haes plaised ye tae dae it this wye
ma faither haes gien aa things ower tae me an naebodie unnerstans tha sinn apairt frae tha faither an naebodie unnerstans tha faither apairt frae tha sinn an whaiver tha sinn wants tae reveal him tae
cum tae me aa you thats wearie an burdent an a wull gie ye rest
tak ma yauk upon ye an lairn frae me fer am gentle an hummle in hairt an yisll fin rest fer yer sowls
fer ma yauk is aisie an ma burden is licht
at that time jesus gaed throu tha coarnfiels on tha sabbath day
his follaers wur hungrie got an the begun tae pluck tha heids aff tha coarn an the et thaim

whaniver tha pharisees saen this the saed tae him luk yer follaers ir daein whuts agin tha laa on tha sabbath day he saed bak tae thaim hae ye no read whut davit daen whaniver him an his freens wus hungrie
he gaed intae tha hoose o god an him an his freens et tha halie showbreid
an thair wus naebodie barrin tha preeshts allooed tae dae this
or hae ye no read in tha laa that tha preeshts in tha hoose o god ir allooed tae wark on tha sabbath day an yit their no hel tae accoont fer brekkin tha laa
a tell ye wer taakin aboot sumthin mair impoartin ner tha hoose o god here

tha scripture says its mercie am efter am no efter secryfice an if ye haed unnerstud tha mainin o these wurds ye wudnae hae saed that ma follaers wus sinners whan the ir no fer tha sinn o man is loard o tha sabbath anaa
jesus gaed on frae that place an he gaed intae thair meetin hoose
an thair wus a man thair an his richt han wus wuthert
lukkin tae hae sumthin agin jesus tha pharisees axt him ir ye allooed tae hail on tha sabbath day
jesus saed bak tae thaim if onie o yis haes a sheep an it faas intae a sheuch on tha sabbath wud ye no tak houl o it an pu it oot
is a man no warth faur mair ner a sheep
ay sae its aa richt tae dae guid on tha sabbath day wi that he saed tae tha man streetch oot yer han
sae he streetcht it oot an it wus aa hailt an jist as guid as tha ither yin
but tha pharisees gaed oot an the collogued thegither hoo the cud dae awa wi jesus
jesus knowin this left that place
an a wile thrang o fowk follaed him an he made aa thair seeck fowk better an he gien thaim a warnin no tae tell oniebodie wha he wus

this wus tae fulfill whut wus spauk aboot him throu tha proaphit isaiah here is ma sarvint ma hanwaaled yin hes tha yin a love hes tha yin am weel plaised wi all pit ma spirit on him an hell tell oot justice tae tha nations
hell no cum argyin or cryin oot nether wull he rise his voice in tha raas
a bent reed hell no brek aff an hell no snuff oot a smolderin wick til he leads justice on tae victrie
in his name tha nations wull pit thair trust
then the brocht him a man bothert wi ill spirits
he wus blin an dum an jesus made him better sae he cud baith taak an see
aa tha fowk wur thunnerstruck an the saed cud this be tha sinn o davit
but whaniver tha pharisees heerd this the saed it is onlie bi beelzebul tha heidyin o tha ill spirits that this fella casts oot ill spirits
knowin thair thochts jesus saed tae thaim iverie kingdom divid agin itsel wull gae tae reck an ruin an iverie citie or hoose divid agin itsel wull no stan
an if satan casts oot satan he is divid agin hissel an hoo then cud his kingdom stan
an if a cast oot ill spirits bi tha pooer o beelzebul bi whut pooer then daes yer ain fowk cast thaim oot
sae let thaim be tha yins tae judge ye fer whut ye hae saed
but if a cast oot ill spirits bi tha spirit o god it proves that tha kingdom o god is here amang ye
or agane hoo can oniebodie git intae a strang mans hoose an cairrie aff his belangins less he furst tyes up tha strang man
efter that he can plunner awa him that is no for me is agin me an him that isnae giein me a han tae gether in he micht as weel be scatterin
an sae a tell ye men wull be forgien iverie sin an blesphemie but tha blesphemie agin tha spirit wull no be forgien
oniebodie that spakes a wurd agin tha sinn o man wull be forgien but oniebodie that spakes agin tha halie spirit wull no be forgien nether in this age ner in tha age tae cum
ye can tell a tree bi its fruit
gin tha trees guid its fruit wull be guid gin its baad its fruit wull be baad
ye sleekit shooer o vipers hoo can ye say ocht thats guid whan yer wickit yersels
fer whuts in yer hairt wull cum oot o yer mooth
a guid man brings guid things oot o tha guidness stored in his hairt a wickit man brings wickit things oot o his store o wickitness
but a tell ye on tha day o reckonin men wull hae tae mak answer fer iverie careless wurd the hae spauk
fer bi yer wurds yell be judged no guiltie an bi yer wurds yell be condemned

then some o tha pharisees an maisters o tha laa saed tae him maister we want a miraclis sign frae ye he saed bak tae thaim its onlie a wickit an adulterous generation wud luk fer a miraclis sign but thairll be nane gien apairt frae tha sign o tha proaphit jonah
fer jist as jonah wus thrie days an thrie nichts in tha belly o a big fish in tha same wye tha sinn o man wull be thrie days an thrie nichts in tha hairt o tha irth
tha men o nineveh wull stan up at tha day o reckonin wi this generation an thell condemn it fer they repentit whaniver jonah praicht tae thaim an yit tha yin thats here noo is mair ner onie jonah

tha queen o tha sooth wull stan up wi this generation tae be judged as weel on that day an she wull condemn it fer she cum frae tha enns o tha irth fer tae listen tae solomons wusdom an noo yin abain solomon is here an yis ir no listenin whan an ill spirit cums oot o a man it raiks throu tha desert lukkin fer rest
but it fins nane
then it says all jist gae bak tae whar a wus leevin afore
whaniver it gaes bak it fins tha hoose empie swep clain an aa redd up
then it gangs an taks wi it seiven ither spirits mair wickit ner itsel an the aa gae in an the settle thair
an that man enns up faur waur ner he wus afore
thats tha wye itll be wi this wickit generation
while jesus wus still taakin tae tha thrang his mither an his brithers stud ootbye lukkin tae spake tae him
summodie toul him yer mither an yer brithers ir waitin ootbye lukkin tae spake tae ye
but jesus cum bak wi this wha is ma mither an wha ir ma brithers

it sprung up quick becas tha clye wus shalla but as shune as it brairdit an tha sin cum oot tha plants wus scorcht an the deed aff acause the haed nae ruits
ither seed faad doon amang thoarns an tha thoarns sprung up tuk ower an chokt it
sae thair wus nae yiel
but a lock drapt on tae guid grun
it daen weel an gien a guid hairst thurtie sixtie or a hunner times mair
an jesus saed let him that haes ears in his heid tak tent an whan he wus on his ain some o tha fowk that wus alang wi tha twal axt him aboot his parables

tha saicret o tha kingdom o god haes bin gien tae ye saed jesus but tae thaim thats ootside tha kingdom a taak in parables sae that the micht aye be lukkin but niver see an aye listenin yit niver unnerstan less the micht turn an thair sins be forgien
an jesus saed if ye dinnae unnerstan this parable hoo ir ye gaun tae unnerstan aa tha rest
tha bodie that scattert tha seed wus sowin tha wurd o god
then some fowk is laik tha seed that faad doon nixt tha pad
as shune as the hear tha wurd alang cums satan an taks it oot o thair hairts
an its jist tha same wi tha seed that fell on tha staney grun
the hear tha wurd an richt awa tak it in wi a gled hairt
but the hae nae ruit sae the cannae houl on tae it whan haird times an trouble cums acause o gods wurd an sae the jist gie up
an thairs ither fowk akin tae tha seed that wus sowed amang tha thoarns
ther aye worryin rinnin efter money an hungrin fer things the hinnae got
an sae thairs nae crap fer tha wurd haesnae a chaunce tae growe
ither fowk is laik tha seed sowed on guid grun
the hear tha wurd tak it tae thair hairts an it gies a guid yiel thurtie sixtie an a hunner times mair
an jesus saed tae thaim wud ye iver think o bringin in a lamp an pittin it unner a boul or tha bed
na ye wud pit it up on a stan
fer thairs naethin hid thatll no be brocht oot intae tha licht an thairs nae saicret thatll no be brocht oot intae tha apen
let him that haes ears in his heid tak tent an he saed tae thaim mine hoo yis listen
fer tha misure yis gie wull be tha misure yis get
ay an itll be even mair
fer him that haes plentie wull be gien mair
an him that haes little even whut he haes wull be tuk awa frae him
an jesus saed tha kingdom o god is jist laik this
tha fairmer scatters seed on tha grun
day an nicht nae metter if hes up an aboot or sleepin tha seed sprouts up an growes tha mair he daesnae unnerstan whut maks it growe
tha seed growes in tha clye itsel furst tha braird shows then tha staaks an then tha heids cums on tha tap o tha staaks
then whan tha crap is ripe tha fairmer taks tha heuk tae it fer hairvest time is cum
an agane he saed whut dye think tha kingdom o god is laik
noo whut storie cud a tell that wud pit it ower tae ye
it is laik a wee bit mustert seed plantit in tha grun tha weeest seed o aa
but whan it growes it gets bigger an bigger tae its tha biggest plant in tha gairden wi a spreed o brenches tha burds can roost unner in oot o tha sin
an jesus toul a hale wheen o parables laik these tae tha fowk tae halp thaim unnerstan
he niver saed ocht tae thaim wioot uisin parables
but whan him an his follaers wur on thair ain he toul thaim whut it aa mained
whan evenin cum roon he saed tae his follaers cmon an well gang ower tae tha ither side o tha loch
whaniver tha thrang wus sent hame jesus wus aareadie in tha boat sae the stairtit oot alang wi some ither wee boats fer tha faur side
aa at yinst a big wun ris up
thair wus a pooerfu stoarm an tha waves wus batin ower tha side o tha boat tae it wus near fu o watter
jesus wus sleepin in tha bak o tha boat on a pilla
his follaers ris him yellin maister dae ye no care if we aa droon
up he got he chackt tha wun an he saed tae tha waves be quait lown doon
then tha wun drapt an it wus aa peace an quaitness
an jesus saed tae thaim hoo cum yis ir sae feart
hae ye nae faith yit
efter aa this the wur hairtscarred an saed tae yin anither whut kine o a man is this
even tha wun an tha waves daes as he bids thaim
sae the went iver tae tha ither side o tha loch tae tha lan whar tha gerasenes leeved
an whaniver jesus wus gettin oot o tha boat richt awa a man wi an ill spirit cum oot frae tha graveyaird fer tae meet him
this man leeved amang tha tombs an naebodie cud houl him doon no een wi chains
fer the wud langelt him han an fit but he puud tha chains sinnerie an tha fetters he brauk apairt
naebodie wus strang eneuch tae curb him
an he wud sprachle aboot nicht an day amang tha tombs an braes scraichin an cuttin hissel wi stanes
whaniver he saen jesus a lang roads aff he run an he faad doon on his knees afore him
he guldert at him whut is it ye ir efter wi me jesus sinn o tha maist heich god
in tha name o god wud ye quit tormentin me fer jesus haed aareadie saed tae him cum oot o tha man ye ill spirit
an jesus axt whut dae the caa ye
ma names legion cum tha answer fer thairs a hale lock o iz
an he kep on beggin jesus no tae senn thaim awa oot o thon kintrie
noo nearhan on tha braeside wus a big herd o pigs hokin fer food
an tha spirits plaidit wi jesus senn iz owerbye tae tha pigs let iz gang intae thaim
an sae jesus allooed thaim
an tha ill spirits cum oot o tha man an the went intae tha pigs an tha herd aa twa thoosan o thaim tuk aff doon tha hill heid furst intae tha loch an tha hale lock o thaim wus droont in tha watter
tha yins mindin tha pigs run aff an toul whut haed tuk place tae tha fowk in tha toon an kintrie roon aboot
an the aa cum oot tae see it fer thairsels
whaniver the cum tae jesus the saen tha man that haed bin taen ower wi tha legion o ill spirits sittin thair quait wi his claes on him an richt in tha heid
an the wur hairtscarred
thaim at haed saen it toul tha fowk tha ins an oots o whut haed happent tae tha man wi tha ill spirits an aboot tha pigs forbye
an tha fowk begun plaidin wi jesus tae quit thair kintrie
whaniver jesus wus gettin aboord tha boat tha man that haed bin tuk iver wi ill spirits rhymed on an on at him tae let him gang wi him
but jesus wudnae alloo him an he saed tae him awa hame tae yer ain yins an tell thaim tha much tha loard haes daen fer ye an hoo hes haed mercie on ye
sae aff tha man went an stairtit tellin fowk roon tha ten toons whut aa jesus haed daen fer him
an the wur aa dumfoonert
noo whaniver jesus went bak in tha boat tae tha ither side o tha loch a hale thrang o fowk gethert roon him on tha shore
an thair wus this man bi tha name o jairus yin o tha heidyins o tha meetin hoose cum up tae jesus an he faad doon on his knees afore him
he plaidit sair wi jesus sayin ma wee dochter is deein
cud ye no cum an lay yer hans on hir sae shell get better an no dee
an jesus went alang wi him
a big thrang o fowk follaed him croodin in on him
thair wus this wumman amang thaim that haed bother wi bleedin fer twal year
she haed tholed a hale lock unner monie docters an efter spennin aa she haed she wus nae better but jist gettin tha waur
noo she haed heerd aboot jesus
she cum up behin him in tha thrang an toucht his cloke becas she thocht if a cud jist touch his claes a wull be made weel agane sae she did it an strecht aff tha bleedin stapt
an she felt in hir bodie that she wus rid o hir bother
richt awa jesus kent tha pooer haed gan oot o him
he turnt roon tae tha crood an he axt wha toucht ma claes
an his follaers cum bak wi this shair luk at aa tha fowk croodin roon ye an ye ir axin wha toucht me
but jesus kep lukkin roon tae see wha haed daen it
then tha wumman knowin fine weel whut haed happent tae hir cum an faad doon at his feet trimmlin wi fear an toul him tha hale truith
dochter he saed til hir yer faith haes made ye weel
gang in peace ye ir redd o yer trouble
while jesus wus still taakin some men cum up frae tha hoose o jairus
yer dochter is deid the saed tae him
ye neednae bother tha maister onie mair
takkin nae heed o whut the saed jesus toul jairus dinnae be feart jist believe
jesus wudnae alloo oniebodie tae gang wi him apairt frae peter jeames an jhone jeames brither
whaniver the cum tae tha hame o tha heidyin o tha meetin hoose jesus saa a hale stir amang tha fowk wi thaim aa roarin an greetin
he went in an saed tae thaim whuts aa this narration an yowlin aboot
tha wee lass is no deid shes jist sleepin
but the lacht at him
sae he put thaim aa oot an he tuk tha weans mither an faither an tha follaers that wur wi him an he went in whar tha wee lass wus
takkin hir bi tha han he saed tae hir talitha cumi mainin wee lass a say tae ye up ye get
richt awa tha wee lass got up on hir feet an waakt aboot
she wus twal yeir oul
at this the wur aa clain flebbergestit
he bid thaim on nae accoont tae tell oniebodie ocht aboot it an he toul thaim tae gie hir a bite tae ait
efter this jesus quit thaim pairts an went on bak tae his hametoon alang wi his follaers
an whaniver tha sabbath day cum roon he stairtit taichin tha fowk thair in tha meetin hoose an monie that heerd him wur stoondit
whar did he get aa this frae
the axt
whuts aa this wusdom that hes bin gien that sitch miracles ir wrocht bi his hans is this no jist tha cairpenter
an hes marys sinn isnt he an tha brither o jeames joseph judas an simon
is his sisters no here wi iz
an the tuk umrage at him
but jesus saed tae thaim a proaphits niver weel thocht o in his hametoon amang his freens or in his ain hoose
he cudnae dae onie miracles thair apairt frae layin his hans on twarthie seeck fowk an makkin thaim better
an he wus tuk bak wi thair want o faith
then jesus went roon aa tha villages lairnin tha fowk
an caain his twal follaers roon him he sent thaim oot in twas an gien thaim pooer ower tha ill spirits
this wus his biddin tak naethin fer tha road apairt frae a stav nae breid nae baag nae copper coins in yer girthpooch
pit sannals on yer feet an tak jist tha claes on yer bak
whutiver hoose yis ir stappin in he saed bide yer time in it til yis tak yer lave o tha toon
an if tha fowk in onie place wull no mak yis walcum or gie yis a hearin dicht tha stour aff yer feet as yis ir leain as a wutness an warnin tae thaim
an sae the went oot praichin that fowk shud turn frae thair sins
the driv oot monie ill spirits an the anointit monie seeck fowk wi oiyle an made thaim better
king herod antipas got wun o this fer tha hale kintrie wus taakin aboot jesus
some fowk wur sayin that jhone tha baptiser wus ris frae tha deid an that wus hoo he cud dae sitch michtie warks
ithers thocht it wus tha proaphit elijah
an yit ithers thocht he maun be a proaphit laik yin o tha proaphits o tha oulden days
whaniver herod heerd this he saed thon jhone that a haed tha heid tuk aff hes cum bak tae life agane fer afore this herod haed gien oarders tae hae jhone brocht in tyed up an put in jail
he daen this acause o herodias that he haed merriet tha mair she wus his brither philips wife
an jhone haed saed tae herod its agin tha laa fer ye tae tak yer brithers wife fer yersel
sae herodias haed it in fer jhone
she wud hae killt him but she cudnae get at him
fer herod haed a guid regaird fer jhone he kent he wus a strecht an halie man sae he kep him oot o hairms wye
whan he heerd jhone it bothert him but aa tha same he aye listened tae him wi a gled hairt
at lang last herodias got hir chaunce on herods birthday
he wus houlin a big spreed fer aa tha heidyins o tha palace tha generls an tha tap men o galilee
whan herodias dochter cum in an daunced it plaised herod an thaim that sut alang wi him
tha king saed tae hir ax fer ocht ye want an all gie it tae ye
he gien hir his wurd on oath ax whut ye wull an all gie it tae ye up tae a half o ma kingdom
an she went oot an saed tae hir mither whutll a ax fer

an tha mither saed bak tae hir ax fer tha heid o jhone tha baptiser wi that tha dochter run bak in afore tha king an she saed whut a want is tha heid o jhone tha baptiser richt noo on a platter tha king wus wile sorrie but becas o tha oath he haed tuk an acause o tha yins wi him roon tha table he didnae dar gae bak on his wurd
sae richt awa tha king sent aff a sodger tae gang an bring tha heid o jhone tha baptiser bak wi him
tha man went awa an he tuk jhones heid aff in tha jail
he brocht it bak on a platter gien it tae tha lassie an she gien it tae hir mither
an whaniver jhones follaers heerd tell o it the cum an tuk his bodie an the layed it oot in a tomb
noo tha possels cum bak tae jesus frae thair trevelin an the toul him aa the haed daen an whut the haed lairnt tha fowk
an whar the wur at thair wus that monie cumin an gaun that the cudnae even get peace tae hae ocht tae ait
sae jesus saed tae thaim cum awa on yer lane tae a quait place an tak it aisie fer a bit
sae the went awa in a boat bi thair lane tae a quait place
noo monie fowk saa thaim as the wur gaun aff an kent wha the wur sae the run on aheid on thair fit frae oot o aa tha toons an the got thair afore thaim
an whan jesus cum tae lan he fun a hale thrang o fowk fornent him an his hairt went oot tae thaim fer the wur laik sheep wannerin wioot a herd tae luk efter thaim
an he begun tae lairn thaim monie things
an whan it wus wearin late his follaers cum an saed tae him its dailygan an this is a richt oot o tha wye place
senn these fowk awa tae tha fairm hooses an clachans roon aboot tae buy thairsels a bite tae ait but jesus saed bak tae thaim yous gie thaim sumthin tae ait an the saed whut wud we buy it wi
it wud tak a wee foartune tae buy fer thaim aa whut hae ye tae ait
qo jesus
awa an fin oot sae awa the gan tae fin oot an the cum bak an toul him we hae five bannocks an twa fish
sae jesus bid thaim aa sit doon in locks on tha green gress
an the sut doon in groups o hunnerts an fifties
an takkin tha five bannocks an tha twa fish he lukt up tae heiven he blisst an brauk tha bannocks an he kep giein thaim tae his follaers tae han oot tae tha fowk
an he divid tha twa fish amang thaim aa as weel
the aa et thair fill an the gethert up aa tha wee bits o breid an fish eneuch tae fill twal creels

thaim five bannocks haed fed five thoosan men richt awa jesus toul his follaers tae get aboord tha boat an tae gang on aheid o him tae tha ither side fornent bethsaida while he toul tha thrang o fowk tae gang hame
an efter leain thaim he went up tha muntin fer tae pray
at dailygan tha boat wus oot in tha middle o tha loch an jesus wus on his lane on tha lan
he saen tha follaers puin haird on tha oars fer tha wun wus blaain agin thaim
an aboot tha fowerth watch o tha nicht he gaed oot tae thaim waakin on tha watter he wus aboot tae pass bye thaim but whaniver the saen him waakin on tha watter the jaloused he wus a wraith
an the yellt oot fer the aa saen him an the wur hairtscarred
strecht awa he spauk oot tae thaim an he saed tak hairt its masel
dinnae be feart then he climmed up intae tha boat alangside o thaim an tha wun deed doon
the wur aa dumfoonert an thocht it wus ower ocht fer the cudnae mak onie sense o tha miracle o tha bannocks thed wutnesst
thair hairts jist wurnae apen tae it
an whan the gaed bak ower tha loch agane the cum tae lan at gennesaret an the drapt enchor thonner at tha shore
noo whaniver the steppit oot o tha boat richt awa tha fowk kent wha jesus wus
the run roon tha hale kintrieside an the stairtit tae cairrie tha seeck on mats tae whariver the heerd he wus at
an noo iveriewhar he went intae tha clachans tha toons or oot in tha kintrie the put tha seeck oot on tha grun in an apen place whar he cud see thaim
the besocht him tae let thaim touch even tha enn o his robe an aa that toucht it wus makkit weel agane
noo thair wus some pharisees an maisters o tha laa that haed cum frae jerusalem an the gethert roon jesus
an the fun faut whaniver the saa some o his follaers aitin breid wi hans that wurnae clain thats tae say the haednae waasht thaim
tha pharisees an aa tha jews dinnae ait afore waashin thair hans houlin tae tha tradeetion o tha elders
whan the cum frae tha mairket the dinnae ait oniethin less the gie it a waash furst

an monie anither thing the houl tae as weel sitch as tha richt wye tae clain thair bickers an jugs thair copper kettles an tables then tha pharisees an tha maisters o tha laa axt jesus fer why dae yer follaers leeve wioot onie regaird tae tha wye it wus hannit doon frae oor elders aitin breid wi thair hans no waasht
he saed bak tae thaim isaiah got it richt whan he proaphesied aboot yous hippycrates as its writ doon this nation honours me wi thair mooth says god but thair hairt is faur awa frae me
thair woarships nae use ava thair taichins ir naethin but manmade rules an regulations

fer yis lea aside tha commauns o god an houl on tae tha tradeetions o men laik tha waashin o pots an bickers an monie anither thing yis dae an he went on tae tell thaim yis hae a quare wye o pittin aside tha laas o god sae as ye can houl tae yer ain tradeetions fer moses saed honour yer faither an yer mither an oniebodie that miscaas thair faither or mither maun be put tae deith
but yous say that its aa richt fer a bodie tae say tae his faither or mither a cannae gie yis onie halp becas a hae vood tae gie whut a hae tae god
an yous let him dae naethin mair fer his faither or mither
sae becas o this yis mak a nonsense o tha wurd o god bi yer tradeetion hannit doon
an monie anither thing yis dae laik that
jesus caad tha thrang tae him agane an saed listen tae me iverie yin o yis an unnerstan this whut gaes intae ye frae tha ootside daesnae sullie ye but its whut cums oot o yer hairt that sullies ye
let him that haes ears in his heid tak tent efter he left tha crood o fowk an gan intae tha hoose his follaers axt him aboot this parable
ir yous as slow on tha uptake as tha ithers
he axt
dae yis no see that its no whut yis ait thatll sullie ye
fer it daesnae gae intae yer hairt but intae yer belly an then passes on oot doon tha drain
bi this jesus wus sayin that onie soart o mait wus clain he went on tae say its whut cums oot o yer hairt that sullies ye

fer its frae wiin yer hairt aa tha wickit thochts cum lustin an thievin murder an adulterie greed doonricht baadness deceit filthynis blekinin fowks cherecter blesphemin pride an iverie kine o fuilishnis
aa these wickit things cum frae tha inside its thaim that sullies a bodie
efter that jesus left galilee an went awa tae tha district roon tyre an sidon
he stapt in a hoose an didnae want oniebodie tae ken it but fer him thair wus nae hidin
fer richt awa a wumman that haed a wee lass wi an ill spirit cum tae him as shune as she heerd he wus thair
she faad doon on hir knees afore jesus an plaidit wi him tae drive tha ill spirit oot frae hir dochter
tha wumman wus a greek wi nae jewish breedin frae tha region o syrophoenicia

a shud gie tha weans thair fill furst he saed tae hir fer its no richt tae tak tha weans breid an clod it tae tha wee dugs ay loard saed she but still wi aa een tha wee dugs unner tha table gits aitin tha weans crumbs
thats a guid answer an becas o it qo he til hir whan ye gae bak hame yell fin tha ill spirit haes left yer dochter
an whaniver tha wumman cum hame richt eneuch she fun tha wee lass lyin quait in hir bed an tha ill spirit gan awa
efter that jesus left tha district o tyre an he went bak doon tae tha loch o galilee passin throu sidon an tha ten toons on his wye
some fowk brocht tae him a man that wus deef an cud harlie taak an the plaidit wi him tae lay his han on him
efter takkin him tae tha side awa frae tha thrang jesus put his fingrs intae tha mans ears
then he sput an toucht tha mans tung wi his spittle
he lukt up tae heiven an giein a big seich he saed tae tha man ephphatha tha aramaic mainin be apent
wi that tha mans ears wus apent his tung wus lowst an he stairtit tae spake laik ither fowk
jesus gien thaim oarders no tae tell oniebodie
but tha mair he warnt thaim tha mair the kep on taakin aboot it
fowk wur flebbergestit
he haes daen aa things weel the saed
he even maks tha deef tae hear an tha dum tae spake

roon aboot thon time whaniver a big thrang o fowk haed gethert thegither an the haed naethin tae ait jesus caad his follaers tae him an he toul thaim ma hairt gaes oot tae these fowk acause the hae bin here wi me this thrie days an the hae naethin lef tae ait if a senn thaim awa hame thell drap wi hungr alang tha road
fer some o thaim haes cum a lang wye
oot here in tha wiles hoo cud we fin eneuch tae fill thaim
axt his follaers
whut feck o breid hae ye
axt jesus
an the saed seiven loafs
then jesus bid tha crood o fowk sit thairsels doon on tha grun
an he tuk tha seiven loafs gien thenks tae god fer thaim brauk thaim up in bits an gien thaim tae his follaers tae han oot tae tha crood
an thats whut the daen
an summodie haed twarthie wee fish
sae he blisst thaim tae an toul his follaers tae gie thaim oot as weel
an efter tha fowk haed et thair fill tha follaers gethert up tha fu o seiven creels o leains
in aa thair wus aboot fower thoosan fowk thair that day
an the wur aa sent bak hame
an richt awa jesus got intae a boat alang wi his follaers an the crosst ower tae tha kintrieside roon bi dalmanutha
thair wus some pharisees cum oot an the stairtit tae quiz him an axt him tae gie thaim a sign frae heiven
the wur jist tryin tae ketch him oot
jesus gien a big seich frae deep doon an saed fer why daes fowk in this day an age keep lukkin fer a sign
am tellin yis thair wull be nae sign gien tae thaim an he got intae tha boat an left thaim an went ower tae tha ither side o tha loch
noo tha follaers didnae mine tae tak breid wi thaim an the haed nae mair than yin loaf atween thaim on tha boat
an jesus chairged thaim sayin luk oot fer tha yeast o tha pharisees an tha yeast o herod
an the taakt amang thairsels sayin this is aa becas we hae brocht nae breid
jesus knowed whut the wur thinkin an he axt thaim why ir yis taakin aboot haein nae breid
dae yis no see
dae yis no unnerstan yit
is yer hairts still that haird
yis hae een ir yis blin
yis hae ears ir yis deef
dae yis no mine ocht ava
whaniver a divid tha five loafs amang tha five thoosan hoo monie baskets o leains did yis lift
twal the saed
an whan a divid tha seiven loafs amang tha fower thoosan hoo monie creels fu o leains did yis lift

tha halie spirit promptit davit tae say tha loard saed tae ma loard sit doon at ma richt han tae a pit yer enemies unner yer feet
noo davit hissel caad tha messiah ma loard sae hoo then can he be his sinn as weel
an tha fowk wur gye gled tae listen tae jesus
