the halp thairsels bi daein weeda weemen oot o aa the hae
an the mak lang screeds o prayers jist fer show
but ye can be shair it wull gang waur wi thaim on tha day o reckonin
an jesus sut doon fornent tha kist in tha hoose o god whar he cud hae sicht o tha fowk pittin thair money intil it
an tha weelaff yins gien weel nae doot aboot it then alang cum a weeda wumman an she drapt in twa wee coins amuntin tae verie little
jesus caad his follaers ower tae him an saed am tellin yis tha truith this puir weeda haes gien mair ner onie o tha ithers that gien offerins
fer the hae aa gien onlie a pittance oot o thair pruch but this weeda puir an aa that she is haes gien aa she haed tae leeve on

yin day as jesus wus gaun oot o tha temple gruns yin o his follaers saed tae him maister wud ye jist luk at thon stanewark an thaim wunnerfu biggins jesus saed bak tae him dae ye see these great biggins

no yin stane here wull be left abain tha ither thatll no be tummelt doon an jesus wus sittin on tha moont o olives fornent tha hoose o god whan peter jeames jhone an andra axt him on tha quait tell iz whan wull aa this cum aboot
wull thair be onie sign its gaun tae happen
an jesus saed tae thaim tak heed an dinnae let oniebodie lead yis aglee
fer monies a yin wull cum in ma name sayin a be tha christ an thell lead monie fowk aglee
whan ye hear tell o wars an o taak aboot wars dinnae be put aboot
fer sitch things maun happen but tha enn is no near jist yit
nations wull mak war on ither nations an kingdoms wull rise up agin ither kingdoms thair wull be irthquakes in monie pairts an thair wull be dirths ower tha lan tae
but aa this is onlie tha stairt o tha bairin pains cumin on
ye maun tak heed
the wull han yis ower tae tha cooncils an gie yis a whuppin in tha meetin hooses
on ma accoont ye wull be stud afore guviners an kings as a wutness tae thaim
but afore this tha guid news maun be praicht tae aa tha nations
noo whaniver yis ir liftit an brocht tae thrial dinnae be ower enxious aboot whut yis ir gaun tae say but whan tha time cums jist say whutiver god tells yis tae
fer then itll no be yous thatll be taakin but itll be tha halie spirit
brithers wull han ower thair brithers tae be killt an faithers thair weans
an weans wull rise up agin thair faithers an mithers an hae thaim put tae deith as weel
yell be haitit bi aa fowk on accoont o me but tha yin that tholes tae tha enn wull be saved

but whaniver yis see tha abomination o desolation spauk aboot bi daniel tha proaphit stannin whar it shudnae be then thaim ats in judea maun tak tae tha hills reader yell unnerstan ma mainin here naebodie thats on his ruiftap shud be gaun bak doon tae get ocht oot o it an naebodie thats awa oot intae his fiel shud be gaun bak fer his coat
in thaim days itll be tarrible fer weemen thats expectin an fer mithers wi weans at tha breesht
pray tae god that this daesnae happen in tha wunter
fer in thaim days thairll be sitch wile sufferin faur waur ner thair iver wus frae tha time god made tha warl til noo an yell niver see tha laik agane
gin tha loard daesnae cut thaim days shoart thairs naebodie wud be saved but its on accoont o his ain chosen yins that hes cut tha days shoart
an if oniebodie shud say tae ye at that time luk here is tha messiah or thair hes thonner dinnae tak onie heed
fer fauss messiahs an fauss proaphits wull rise up an dae signs an wunners an fowk wull be tuk in bi thaim ay an een tha chosen yins micht be tuk in tae
but tak heed a hae toul ye aa this aheid o time sae as yell know
but in thaim days efter tha time o sufferin tha sin wull be mirkit an tha muin wull no gie onie licht tha starns wull be faain oot o heiven an tha pooers o tha lift wull be dinnelt
an then aa fowk wull see tha sinn o man cumin in tha cloods in michtie pooer an glorie
an then he wull senn his angels oot tae gether thegither his chosen yins frae tha fower wuns frae tha ootermaist pairt o tha irth tae tha ootermaist pairt o heiven
noo lairn this lesson frae tha fig tree
as shuin as its brenches stairts tae bud an its leafs cum oot ye ken tha simmer is no faur aff
in tha same wye whaniver ye see these things happenin yell ken tha time is nearhan ay at tha verie dure itsel
am tellin ye tha truith thairs fowks leevin noo thatll no dee afore aa these things haes cum aboot heiven an irth wull pass awa but ma wurds wull niver pass awa
naebodie kens tha day or oor whan aa this wull happen nether tha angels in heiven ner tha sinn hissel
tha faither alane kens
tak heed keep a lukoot an pray fer ye dinnae ken whan that time wull be
fer tha cumin o tha sinn o man is laik a man gaun tae a faurawa lan that haes left his hoose in tha chairge o his sarvints
he gien thaim aa thair ain wark tae dae an he toul tha dureman tae be on tha lukoot fer him cumin bak

sae yous be on tha lukoot tae fer ye dinnae ken whan tha laird wull be bak whuther at tha gloamin or at midnicht or in tha wee smaa oors or at tha scraich o day less cumin on ye o a suddent hell fin ye sleepin
whut a say tae ye a say tae yin an aa be on tha lukoot

it wus twa days afore tha passower an tha faist o bairmless breid an tha heid preeshts an tha maisters o tha laa wus colloguin thegither tae git tha houl o jesus bi some sleekit wye fer tae pit him tae deith
but no whaniver tha faists on the saed or well hae a garevitch on oor hans
yin day whan jesus wus in simon tha lepers hoose in bethanie he wus at tha boord fer a bite tae ait whan a wumman cum in wi a wee crock o scent it wus oyle o pure nard an coast big money
brekkin aff tha tap o tha stoup she poored tha oyle ower his heid
but some o thaim that wus thair wus sair illplaised an saed yin tae tither whut fer wus this waste o guid nard
fer it cud hae bin soul fer mair ner thrie hunner siller coins an tha catter gien tae tha puir
sae the turnt an yaukt tha wumman
but jesus saed lea hir alane
dinnae bother hir fer this is a guid thing shes daen fer me
fer yell aye hae tha puir wi yis an ye can be guid tae thaim whaniver ye want
but yell no aye hae me wi ye
she haes daen aa she cud fer she haes cum aforehan tae anoint ma bodie fer buryin
am tellin ye tha truith whariver tha guid news is praicht ower tha hale warl hir storie wull be toul sae as shell niver be fergot
an judas iscariot yin o tha twal gaed awa tae tha heid preeshts fer tae bethray jesus intae thair hans
an whan the heerd it the wur richt gled an gien thair wurd tae gie him siller fer his wark
sae he lukt oot fer a guid chaunce tae han jesus ower
on tha furst day o tha faist o bairmless breid whan the aye killt tha passower lamb jesus follaers axt him whar dae ye want iz tae gang tae mak readie fer tha passower mail
sae jesus sent oot twa o his follaers intae jerusalem wi thair oarders
as ye gang intae tha citie he toul thaim a man cairryin a crockerie jar o watter wull meet ye
follae him an say tae tha guidman o tha hoose he gangs intae tha maister says whar is ma ruim whar a can ait tha passower wi ma follaers
an he wull show yis a big upstair ruim plenisht an aa
ye ir tae mak it readie fer iz thair
tha follaers gan oot an awa intae tha citie an the fun it jist as he haed saed
sae the made readie tha boord fer tha passower mail
whan it wus weel on in tha evenin jesus cum wi tha twal possels
as the wur lyin at tha boord an aitin jesus saed a tell ye tha truith yin o yis thats suppin wi me noo is fer bethrayin me
the wur aa sorrie whaniver the heerd this an yin bi yin the axt him is it me ye ir taakin aboot
an anither yin saed is it me he saed bak tae thaim its yin o yous twal thats dippin his han in tha boul wi me fer a tha sinn o man maun follae tha road tha scriptures foretoul lang syne
but wile sorra tae tha yin that bethrays me
faur better fer that man if he haed niver bin boarn an as the wur aitin jesus tuk breid in his hans an gien thenks tae god
then he brauk it an he hannit it tae his follaers sayin tak it this is ma bodie
an he tuk a bicker o wine an gien thenks tae god fer it
then he hannit it roon an the aa drunk frae it
an he saed tae thaim this is ma bluid a sign o gods new coveynant sealed wi ma bluid poored oot fer monie
mairk this all drink nae mair o tha fruit o tha vine tae a drink a new wine in tha kingdom o god
then the sung tha passower psaum an the went oot on tae tha moont o olives
yisll aa faa awa on accoont o me tha nicht jesus saed tae thaim
fer as its writ a wull strike tha shepherd an tha sheepll be scattert
but efter a hae ris frae tha deid all tak tha foreroad o ye intae galilee

an peter saed tae him tha mair tha restll faa awa all no peter jesus saed tae him a tell ye tha truith afore this verie nichts oot an tha rooster craas twice yell say thrie times ower that ye dinnae ken me
na saed peter aa tha mair earnest no een if a hae tae dee wi ye a wull niver deny ye an aa alang wi him vood tha same
an the cum tae a place bi tha name o gethsemane an he saed tae his follaers sit doon here til a gang an pray
an he tuk peter jeames an jhone wi him an a wile dhread an pooerfu hairtsorra cum ower him
an he saed tae thaim ma hairts brekkin wi anguish near tae deith
yous bide here an stye awaak
an gaun forrit a weethin he cast hissel tae tha grun an he prayed that if poassible tha oor o sufferin micht gang bye him
abba faither he saed aa things ir poassible wi you
nochts abain yer pooer
tak awa this cup o sufferin frae me
nane tha less its your wull am wantin an no ma ain
an he cum bak an he fun thaim sleepin sae he saed tae peter simon ir ye sleepin cud ye no stye awaak even tha yin oor
watch an pray sae ye dinnae gie in tae temptation
tha spirits wullin but tha bodies waik
an agane he gaed awa an he prayed tha same wurds an whaniver he cum bak yinst mair he fun thaim sleepin fer the cudnae keep thair een apen an the didnae ken whut answer tae gie him
yit a thurd time he cum bak an he saed tae thaim ir yis aye sleepin an aye takkin yer rest
thats eneuch noo luk tha oor haes cum an tha sinn o man is bethrayed intae tha hans o wrangdaers

git up noo an well be aff here cums ma bethrayer tha wurds wusnae richt aff his tung whan up cum judas yin o tha twal an alang wi him wus a hale thrang o fowk wi swords an stavs sent oot frae tha heid preeshts an maisters o tha laa an tha elders
an tha traiter haed gien thaim a sign him that a kiss saed he is tha man yer lukkin
tak tha houl o him an keep him weel gairded
as shuin as judas cum he gaed strecht up tae jesus an he saed rabbi an he kisst him
then tha ithers tuk houl o jesus an arrestit him
an yin o thaim that stud bye tuk oot a sword an he hut tha sarvint o tha heich preesht an he sneddit aff his lug
jesus saed tae thaim am a some soart o a reiver that ye hae cum oot agin me wi swords an stavs fer tae tak me
shair a wus wi yis iverie day in tha hoose o god taichin ye yit ye niver layed a han on me
but whuts writ in tha halie scriptures maun cum aboot
an tha hale lock o thaim left him an run awa
but thair wus a young man follaein him wi nocht on him but a linen claith wrapt roon his nakit bodie an the tuk houl o him
but he run aff scuddybare leain tha claith in thair hans
an the tuk jesus awa tae tha heich preesht an aa tha heid preeshts tha elders o tha fowk an tha maisters o tha laa wus gethert thegither
an peter follaed him a lang wye behin richt intae tha palace yaird an he sut doon alang wi tha gairds an wairmed hissel at tha apen fire
noo tha heid preeshts an tha hale cooncil wus lukkin fer men at wud wutness agin jesus sae the cud pit him tae deith
but the cudnae fin onie
fer tha mair monies a yin wutnesst agin him whut the cum oot wi didnae cumpluther
in tha enn some o tha wutnesses stud up an saed we heerd him oorsels
he saed all pu doon this hoose o god bigged bi man
an in thrie days all big anither yin an itll no be tha han o man that bigs it
but thair stories didnae cumpluther
an tha heich preesht ris tae his feet in tha middle o thaim aa
an he axt jesus hae ye nae answer tae these chairges
whut hae ye tae say fer yersel
but jesus hel his tung
sae tha heich preesht put anither question tae him ir ye tha christ tha sinn o tha blissit yin
an jesus saed a am
an ye wull see me tha sinn o man saitit at tha richt han o tha michtie yin an cumin in tha cloods o heiven
wi that tha heich preesht tore his claes an saed whut need hae we o onie mair wutnesses
yis hae aa heerd his blesphemie fer yersels
whut dae yis jalouse o it
an the aa saed he desarved tae be put tae deith
an some o thaim fell tae spittin on him
the put a blinfoul on him an hemmert him wi thair fists sayin tell iz wha hut ye an even tha gairds tuk tae slappin him wi tha flet o thair hans
noo aa this time peter wus doon in tha coortyaird an yin o tha heich preeshts sarvin lasses cum bye
seein peter wairmin hissel at tha fire she tuk a guid luk at him an saed you wur wi jesus frae nazareth tae sae ye wur but peter wudnae own up tae it
a dinnae ken whut yer taakin aboot saed he an he slipt oot intae tha entrie
jist then a rooster craad
an tha sarvin lass saen him agane an yinst mair she stairtit tellin tha ithers hingin aboot thairs nae doot this mans yin o thaim peter denied it yinst mair
an a wee while efter tha yins roon aboot saed tae peter agane ye maun be yin o thaim fer bi tha wye ye taak ye ir frae galilee
as gods ma wutness saed peter a sweer a dinnae ken this man at that verie minnit tha rooster craad tha saicont time
an richt awa peter haed mine o tha wurds jesus spauk tae him afore tha rooster craas twice ye wull deny me thrie times
at tha verie thocht o it he brauk doon an wep sair
at tha scraich o day tha heid preeshts got thegither wi tha elders an maisters o tha laa an tha hale cooncil taakt aboot whut the wud dae nixt
the tyed jesus up an maircht him aff an hannit him ower tae pilate
an pilate axt him ir you tha king o tha jews
jesus answert you hae saed it
an tha heid preeshts brocht forrit monie chairges agin him but he niver saed a wurd bak sae pilate axt him agane ir ye no fer sayin ocht
whut aboot aa these chairges brocht agin ye
but whaniver jesus wud say naethin mair pilate wus quare an tuk bak
noo iverie yeir at tha passower faist pilate uist tae let yin o tha prisners oot whaiver tha fowk axt fer
yin o thaim at tha time a man bi tha name o barabbas wus in fer murder alang wi ither rebels frae tha risin agin tha romans
tha thrang gaed up an the axt pilate tae let a prisner oot as he aye daen yinst a yeir
pilate axt thaim dae yis want me tae let oot tha king o tha jews
fer he knowed richt weel it wus jist oot o spite that tha heid preeshts haed hannit jesus ower tae him
but tha heid preeshts egged tha thrang on tae say na no jesus let barabbas oot sae whut wull a dae then wi tha yin yis caa king o tha jews
axt pilate agane
crucyfie him the cryed oot
whut fer
whuts he daen wrang
pilate axt thaim
but tha thrang jist roared aa tha mair crucyfie him noo pilate wus wantin tae plaise tha crood sae he lut barabbas oot tae thaim
he haed jesus gien a guid whalin wi a whup an then he hannit him ower fer tae be crucyfied
tha sodgers tuk jesus awa tae tha coortyaird o tha guviners big hoose an the brocht thegither tha hale regiment
an the rigged him oot in a purple robe an the plettit thoarns thegither intae a croon an the put it on his heid
an the begoud tae salute him cryin oot lang leeve tha king o tha jews the hut him ower tha heid agane an agane wi a stav an sput on him
the got doon on thair knees afore him an lut on tae woarship him
an efter the haed daen makkin a mockerie o him the tuk tha purple robe aff him an put his ain claes bak on an tuk him oot fer tae crucyfie him
thair wus this man the caad simon frae cyrene tha faither o alexander an rufus makkin his wye in frae tha kintrie
an the gart him tae cairrie tha cross
an the brocht jesus tae a place bi tha name o golgotha mainin tha place o tha skull
then the put wine mixt wi myrrh tae his mooth but he wudnae tak it
an tha sodgers nailt him tae tha cross
then the divid his claes amang thaim bi cloddin dice tae see wha wud get whut
it wus nine in tha moarnin whaniver the crucyfied him
an the put a signboord abain him wi tha chairge tha king o tha jews writ on it
the crucyfied twa robbers alang wi him yin on his richt han side an tha tither on his left

an sae it cum aboot laik tha scriptures saed aforehan he wus coontit amang tha laa brekkers thaim at waakt bye yellt abuse at him shakin thair heids an sayin hey you ye saed ye wur gaun tae desthroy tha hoose o god an big it agane in thrie days sae cum doon aff that cross noo an save yersel in tha same wye tha heid preeshts an tha maisters o tha laa mockt him an saed amang thairsels he saved ithers but he cannae save hissel
this christ this king o israel shud cum doon aff that cross noo then well believe an tha twa that wus crucyfied alang wi jesus hurlt abuse at him forbye
an dairkness cum ower tha hale lan frae nuin tae thrie in tha efternuin
an jist then jesus gien a lood cry eli eli lama sabachthani mainin ma god ma god why hae ye forsook me
an some o tha yins stannin nearhan heerd this an saed listen hes caain oot fer elijah yin o thaim run an wat a sponge wi soor wine put it on a lang stick an hel it up fer jesus tae drink
lea him alane an well see if elijah cums tae tak him doon qo he
an wi anither lood cry jesus gien his last breath
tha curtin in tha halie o halies wus tore in twa frae tap tae bottom

an whaniver tha centurion that stud fornent jesus heerd him cryin oot an saen tha wye he deed he saed thair can be nae doot this man wus tha sinn o god some weemen wus stannin awa bak takkin it aa in amang thaim wus mary magdalene an mary tha mither o young jeames an o joses as weel as salome
these wur tha weemen that uist tae follae jesus an luk efter him whaniver he wus bak in galilee
an monie ither weemen that haed cum up wi him tae jerusalem wur thair forbye
it wus preparation day tha day afore tha sabbath

sae as it wus wearin on tae evenin joseph o arimathea a man weel up in tha cooncil wha wus waitin on tha kingdom o god hissel tuk his courage in his hans an he went up tae pilate fer tae ax fer tha bodie o jesus
pilate wus fair tuk bak whan he heerd that jesus wus aareadie deid
he caad tha centurion an axt him wus that richt
whaniver he heerd frae tha centurion that jesus wus aareadie deid he lut joseph hae tha bodie
sae joseph bocht some linen claith tuk doon tha bodie happt it in tha claith an layed it in a tomb cut oot o tha roak
then he rowlt tha stane agin tha apenin o tha tomb
an mary magdalene an mary tha mither o joses saa whar the layed oot his bodie
tha nixt evenin whan tha sabbath wus iver mary magdalene an salome an mary tha mither o jeames bocht sweet smellin oyles fer tae pit on jesus bodie
on tha furst day o tha week at tha scraich o day jist as tha sin wus risin the cum tae tha tomb
the axt amang thairsels whas gaun tae rowl awa tha stane fer iz frae tha mooth o tha tomb
whan the lukt up the saa tha stane haed bin rowlt awa
it wus a pooerfu big stane
whaniver the went intae tha tomb the saen a young man wi a white robe on him sittin on tha richt han side an the wur thunnerstruck
dinnae be sae feart he saed
yis ir lukkin fer jesus o nazareth that the crucyfied
hes ris
hes no here luk fer yersels this is tha place whar the layed him oot
but gae noo an tell his follaers an tell peter that jesus is awa on aheid o yis intae galilee
yell see him thonner jist as he toul ye
tha weemen cum oot frae tha tomb an tuk aff trimmlin an dumfoonert
an the niver saed ocht tae oniebodie fer the wur that feart
noo whan jesus ris on tha furst day o tha week he showed hissel furst tae mary magdalene that he haed driv seiven wickit spirits oot o
an she went an toul thaim that haed bin wi him that wur sairhairtit an greetin
whan the heerd that jesus wus leevin agane an that she haed saen him the didnae believe it
an efter this jesus appeart lukkin differnt tae twa o thaim waakin oot intae tha kintrie
the cum bak an toul tha ithers tae but the wudnae tak thair wurd fer it ether

later on jesus showed hissel tae tha eleiven that wur aitin roon tha boord an he chackt thaim fer no haein mair faith an fer no bein wullin tae believe thaim that haed saen him efter he wus ris frae tha deid
an he saed tae thaim gang oot intae tha hale warl an praich tha guid news tae aa mankine
oniebodie that believes an is baptised wull be saved but oniebodie that daesnae believe wull be condemned

whariver believers gangs these miraclis signs wull gae alang wi thaim in ma name the wull drive oot ill spirits an thell spake wi ither leids thell lift snakes up wi thair hans an if the drink onie deidlie puzhion itll no dae thaim onie hairm ava
thell pit thair hans on seeck fowk an thell get better agane
efter tha loard haed spauk tae thaim he wus taen up intae heiven an sut doon at tha richt han o god
then his follaers went oot praichin iveriewhar an tha loard wrocht alang wi thaim an thair message wus bakt up wi miraclis signs
amen
maist warthie theophilus a hale lock o fowk haes taen it in han tae draa up an accoont o aa tha things that haes cum aboot amang iz
the hae brocht thegither whut wus hannit doon tae iz frae yins that saa it aa wi thair ain een richt frae tha stairt an that becum sarvints o tha wurd o god

an sae haein lukt intae it aa masel richt frae whaniver tha hale storie begun a thocht it wud be a guid thing fer me tae pit doon a trig accoont fer ye forbye theophilus tae mak ye shair o tha truith o whut ye hae bin lairnt
whaniver herod wus king o judea thair wus this preesht caad zechariah
noo he belanged til tha preeshtlie connection o abijah an his wife lizbeth hir femlie went bak til tha dochters o aaron as weel
an the wur baith upricht in tha loards sicht keepin aa tha commauns an laas o tha loard
but the haed nae femlie fer lizbeth cudnae hae weans an tha baith o thaim wus weel up in yeirs

yin time whan it wus tha turn o zechariahs connection fer daein thair dutie in tha hoose o god zechariah wus pickt oot bi tha draain o lots laik tha preeshts aye daen in thaim days tae gang intae tha halie o halies an burn incense
noo whaniver tha time cum roon fer burnin tha incense aa tha fowk wus ootbye prayin
an aa o a suddent an angel o tha loard appeart stannin on tha richt han side o tha althar o incense zechariah wus tuk bak whan he saen tha angel an he wus hairtscarred
but tha angel saed dinnae be feart zechariah fer god haes heerd yer prayer an yer wife lizbeth wull gie ye a wee sinn an ye maun caa him jhone
yell be quare an gled whan hes boarn an sae wull a brave wheen o ither fowk alang wi ye
fer he wull be ootstannin in tha sicht o tha loard
hes no tae tak wine or onie ither kine o strang drink an hell be fu o tha halie spirit richt frae his mithers wame
an hell gether monie an israelite bak tae tha loard thair god

he wull be laik elijah fu o gods spirit an pooer he wull saffen tha hairts o tha faithers tae thair weans turnin contrairie yins tae a richt wye o thinkin an he wull gang afore tha loard tae mak tha fowk readie fer him
zechariah axt tha angel hoo cud a be shair whut yer sayins richt
fer baith me an tha wife is weel up in yeirs then tha angel saed am gabriel
an am cum strecht frae god hissel fer tae gie ye this guid news
mairk this weel seein as ye niver believed whut a toul ye yell be struck dum an no be fit tae taak tae tha weans boarn
but thisll cum aboot in tha richt time
aa tha while tha yins ootbye wus wunnerin hoo cum zechariah wus takkin sae lang in tha loards hoose
whaniver he cum oot he cudnae say ocht ava ner taak tae tha fowk
the knowed bi tha signs he wus giein he maun hae saen a vision in tha hoose o tha loard but aa tha while he cudnae taak
bye an bye whaniver he haed his turn at tha althar daen he went bak hame
no lang efter that lizbeth fun oot she wus gaun tae hae a wean an sae she stapt in tha hoose oot o sicht fer five month
tha loard haes bin mair ner guid tae me lizbeth saed an am no affrontit onie langr wi haein nae femlie
whan lizbeth wus six month gan god sent tha angel gabriel tae tha toon o nazareth in galilee tae a virgin bi tha name o mary that wus trystit tae a man caad joseph descendit frae king davit

mary wus aa throu hirsel as she tried tae mak sense o whut tha angel haed telt hir

tak tent ye ir fer haein a wean a sinn an ye maun caa him jesus
he wull be ootstannin an be caad tha sinn o tha maist heich god
an god wull gie him tha throne o his forefaither davit an he wull rule ower israel fer iver an aye an thairll be nae enn tae his kingdom

an sae tha wean boarn tae ye wull be halie an wull be caad tha sinn o god
an yer cousin lizbeth is fer haein a sinn in hir oul age as weel tha mair fowk thocht she cudnae hae onie but shes in hir sixth month

wurd wusnae lang gaun roon o hoo guid tha loard haed bin til hir an hir freens an nighbers wus aa wile plaised

an jesus went on tae say yin time thair wus this weelaff man that dresst up in fancie claes an leeved iverie day in tha lap o luxurie
an then thair wus this puir beggar covert wi sairs caad lazarus that lay at his gate
lazarus wus hopin that tha rich man wud gie him tha leains frae his table
whiles tha doags wud cum an lick his sairs
in tha enn tha beggar deed an tha angels cairriet him awa tae be wi abraham
tha rich man deed forbye an wus buriet
an whan he wus sufferin sair in hell he cud see abraham an lazarus thegither a lang wyes aff

an he cryed oot tae thaim an saed faither abraham tak peetie on me an senn lazarus tae dook tha enn o his fingr in tha watter tae cool ma tung doon fer am tormentit wi tha bleeze o this fire but abraham saed ma sinn dae ye mine tha time whan ye wur leevin on irth
you haed iveriethin an lazarus haed naethin an noo hes at peace an ye ir tormentit
an apairt frae aa that thairs a big deep sheuch atween iz baith sae that we can hae nae dailins wi yin anither
then tha rich man saed faither abraham wud ye no senn lazarus tae ma faithers hoose tae warn ma five brithers sae that the dinnae enn up here in torment laik masel

but abraham saed bak tae him the hae bin aareadie warnt bi moses an tha proaphits let thaim tak heed tae that warnin an tha rich man saed na faither abraham but if summodie frae tha deid appeart tae thaim the wud turn awa frae thair sins an bak tae god
but abraham saed if the dinnae heed whut moses an tha proaphits toul thaim then itll no mak onie differnce if summodie cum bak tae thaim frae tha deid

yin day jesus saed tae his follaers thairll aye be temptation tae dae wrang but dear halp tha yin that daes tha tempin it wud be faur better fer him if a millstane wus hung roon his neck an he wus drapt intae tha sea rether ner him leadin yin o these puir wee craiters asthray
listen here if summodie daes ocht agin ye tell him he shudnae hae daen it an if he says hes sorrie then forgie him
an if he keeps on daein ye wrang seiven times a day an is sorrie iverie time then ye maun still forgie him
an tha possels saed tae tha loard show iz hoo we can hae mair faith
an tha loard saed if yis haed faith as smaa as a mustert seed even yis cud say tae this mulberry tree cum oot bi tha ruit an plant yersel in tha sea an richt awa itd dae whut its toul
whaniver yer sarvin man cums in frae tha plooin an mindin tha beese ye wudnae say tae him sit yersel doon quick an hae a bite tae ait
rether ye wud tell him tae clain hissel up an sarve you furst an then tak his ain efter
a doot ye wudnae say thenks tae yer ain man fer daein whut hes pyed tae dae in tha same wye whan ye dae ma biddin ye shud say wer naethin oot o tha ordinarie fer we hae daen nae mair ner we haed tae
an sae jesus went on tae jerusalem follaein tha mairch atween samaria an galilee

as he went intae yin o tha villages he saa ten men that wur lepers stannin a wyes aff an the caad oot tae him jesus maister tak peetie on iz an whaniver he saa thaim he saed awa tae tha preeshts an let thaim luk at ye
an lo an behoul as the went thair wye the wur hailt an yin o thaim whan he saen he wus cured turnt bak an cryed oot at tha tap o his voice praise god then he faad doon at jesus feet an gien thenks
an tha man wus a samaritan sae he wus
did a no cure ten men
axt jesus
whars tha ither nine
hae nane o thaim cum bak tae gie thenks tae god apairt frae this foreigner
jesus saed tae tha man rise up an gang yer wye yer faith haes made ye weel

yin time whaniver tha pharisees axt jesus whan gods kingdom wud cum he toul thaim yis cannae say here it is or thair it is tha kingdom o god is aareadie here amang yis sae thairs nae use lukkin fer it cumin an he saed tae his follaers tha day wull cum whan yisll want tae see tha sinn o man
yisll luk fer me an all no be here
fowk micht say hes here or hes thair but tak nae notysh an dinnae rin efter thaim
fer jist as tha lichtnin fleshes ower tha lift thats whut laik itll be tha day tha sinn o man cums bak
but afore that hell hae tae suffer sair an tha fowk roon him noo wull turn agin him
whaniver tha sinn o man cums bak itll be jist laik it wus in noahs day
fer fowk wus aitin an drinkin an gettin merriet richt up tae tha verie day noah went intae tha airk then tha watter floodit an aa wur droont
it wull be tha same as it wus in tha time o lot the et an the drunk an the cairriet on wi thair bizness o buyin sellin fairmin an biggin
but tha verie day that lot went oot o sodom fire an brimstane cum doon frae heiven an the wur aa killt
tha same wull happen tha day yis see tha sinn o man cum bak
on that day naebodie shud lea his ruiftap an be gaun bak doon fer ocht in his hoose an naebodie shud lea his fiel ether tae gae bak hame
mine whut happent tae lots guidwife whaiver houls on tae his life wull loass it an whaiver gies up his life wull aye hae it
am tellin yis in that nicht twa fowk wull be in tha yin bed yin wull be tuk an tha ither lef behin
twa weemen wull be grindin mail thegither yin wull be tuk an tha ither lef behin
twa men wull be in tha fiel tha yin wull be tuk an tha ither lef behin an his follaers axt him whar wull this tak place
an jesus toul thaim whar ye see a crood o vulters ye know thairs a deid bodie aboot
ay sae whaniver ye see tha signs am taakin aboot then yell know weel eneuch
jesus toul his follaers this parable that meent that the shud aye pray an no gie up
an it went laik this thair wus this judge in a big toon that haed nae fear o ether god ner man an haed nae thocht fer oniebodie
in that same toon thair wus this weeda wumman that kep on cumin tae tha judge sayin wud ye mak shair a get a fair dail in tha coort frae tha yin thats agin me
at tha stairt tha judge niver bothert fer a lang time he did naethin
but then he saed tae hissel tha mair a dinnae fear god or care aboot fowk still wi aa a wull halp oot this weeda wumman fer shes giein me that much bother
am scunnert wi hir aye rinnin tae me tha loard went on yis unnerstan whut tha baad judge is sayin
dae yis no think god wull tak tha pairt o his ain fowk that cry oot tae him day an nicht
hell no keep pittin thaim aff sae hell no
am tellin yis hell no be lang in seein justice daen
but whaniver tha sinn o man cums bak a wunner wull he fin oniebodie wi faith on tha irth
an he toul anither parable tae tha yins that wus fu o thairsels an thocht the wur aa richt an lukt doon on ithers
thair wus twa men went up tae tha hoose o god fer tae pray
yin wus a pharisee an tha ither wus a tex man

tha pharisee ris tae his feet an prayed tae hissel o god a thenk ye that am no laik ither fowk ner fer that metter laik thon tex boy ower thonner a dinnae chait fowk a dae naethin wrang an a keep tae me ain wife
a fast twice in tha week an a gie a tenth o aa a hae

but tha tex man stud awa bak an wudnae as much as lift his een tae heiven but he bate his breesht in sorra an saed o god hae mercie on me fer am naethin but a sinner a tell ye this tex man an no tha pharisee went doon tae his hoose in guid stannin wi god
fer tha yin that thinks a lock o hissel wull be brocht doon but tha yin thats hummle wull be liftit up
an as weel the brocht wee weans tae jesus sae that he cud pit his hans on thaim tae bliss thaim
but whaniver tha follaers saen this the chackt tha fowk
but jesus toul thaim tae cum on aheid an saed alloo tha weans tae cum tae me dinnae stap thaim fer tha kingdom o god belangs tae tha laik o these
am tellin ye whaiver daesnae tak tha kingdom o god intae his hairt laik a wean daes wull no get in ava
yinst an impoartin bodie axt him guid maister whut maun a dae tae be shair a get tae heiven an leeve fer iver
an jesus saed bak tae him why ir ye caain me guid
thairs naebodie guid apairt frae god
ye weel ken tha commauns dinnae commit adulterie dinnae murder dinnae tak whuts no yer ain dinnae tell lees aboot ither fowk an gie respeck tae yer faither an yer mither
an tha bodie saed bak tae him a hae daen aa these things since a wus onie age
whan jesus heerd this he saed tae tha man thairs jist yin thing ye still hae tae dae
sell aa ye hae an gie tae thaim that haesnae much an yell hae walth in heiven
an then cum bak an follae me noo whaniver tha man heerd this he wus doon in tha mooth fer he haed a wile lock o money

an whaniver jesus saa tha wye tha man tuk it he saed hoo verie haird it is fer thaim that haes money tae git intae tha kingdom o god fer it wud be aisier fer a kemel tae gae throu tha ee o a needle ner fer a monied man tae git intae tha kingdom o god
an tha yins that heerd it axt wha in aa tha warl can be saved then

an jesus saed thaim things men cannae dae gods mair ner fit tae dae wi that peter saed mine we hae left iveriethin behin an follaed ye an jesus saed tae thaim am tellin yis oniebodie that haes left his hoose his faither an mither brithers wife or weans fer tha sake o tha kingdom o god wull dae weel an hae plentie in this warl an in tha warl tae cum he wull hae iverlastin life
then he tuk tha twal tae tha side an he saed tae thaim see here wer gaun up tae jerusalem an aa thats bin writ doon bi tha proaphits aboot tha sinn o man wull tak place thair
fer hell be hannit ower tae tha gentiles fer thaim tae mak fun o him trait him ill an spit on him
an the wull gie him a whuppin an kill him but on tha thurd day he wull rise tae life agane
but the didnae unnerstan onie o tha things he saed fer tha mainin wus hid frae thaim an the jist cudnae tak it in
noo whan jesus wus cumin up tae jericho on tha ootskirts a blin man wus sittin beggin on tha bunker o tha road
whan he heerd tha thrang gaun bye he axt whut it wus aa aboot an the toul him jesus o nazareth is cumin

tha blin man cryed oot jesus sinn o davit tak peetie on me an tha yins that went afore jesus scoult tha beggar an the toul him tae be quait but he guldert aa tha mair sinn o davit tak peetie on me an jesus stapt an saed bring tha blin man tae me an whan the did jesus axt him whut dae ye want me tae dae fer ye
an he saed loard a want tae be able tae see agane
an jesus saed bak tae him hae yer sicht yer faith haes made ye hale
richt awa he cud see agane an he follaed jesus giein glorie tae god
an whaniver aa tha ither fowk saa this the gien praise tae god as weel
an jesus cum tae tha toon o jericho an wus trevelin throu it
noo thair wus this man caad zacchaeus that wus a heid tex man an he wus quare an weelaff
an he wus wantin tae see fer hissel whut jesus wus laik but he wus a wee man an he cudnae get near jesus fer tha crood
sae he run awa on aheid an shinned up a sycomore fig tree alang tha wye tae hae a guid luk at jesus whan he wus gaun bye

an whan jesus cum tae tha tree he lukt up an saed til him zacchaeus git doon or that richt noo fer am gaun tae yer hoose tha day sae zacchaeus lep doon oot o tha tree an tuk him hame an gien him a wile guid walcum
aa tha fowk saen this an stairtit tae pass remairks sayin hes stappin ower wi a wrangdaer oniehoo zacchaeus stud up an toul jesus a tell ye whut loard
all gie tha half o whut a hae tae thaim at haes need o it
an if a hae got oniethin bi chaitin all pye it bak fower times ower
an jesus saed salvation haes cum tae this hoose tha day fer this man is a sinn o abraham as weel a masel tha sinn o man hae cum tae luk fer thaim ats loast an tae save thaim
an tha hale crood tuk tent o whut jesus wus sayin
an as jerusalem wus nearhan he stairtit tae tell thaim a parable fer fowk thocht that tha kingdom o god wus gaun tae cum aboot at yinst
he toul thaim this a weel boarn man went awa tae a fauraff lan
he wus tae hae hissel crooned king an then he wus tae cum bak agane
afore he went but he caad ten o his sarvin men an gien each o thaim yin gowld coin an he saed tae thaim tak this catter an mak tha maist o it tae a cum bak
but he wusnae weel thocht o amang his ain fowk an sae the sent oot wurd efter he went awa sayin we dinnae want this man tae rule ower iz
but he got tae be king aa tha same an he cum bak hame
then he oardert tha sarvin men tae gie an accoont o hoo the haed daen wi tha catter he haed gien thaim
tha furst yin toul him loard yer coin haes made ten mair
weel daen saed tha king
ye ir a guid sarvint
ye hae showed a can trust ye in wee things
all gie ye ten cities tae rin an tha saicont yin cum an saed loard yer coin haes made five coins
an tha king saed all gie ye five cities tae rin
wi that anither yin cum up an saed luk loard heres yer coin
a hae kep it lapt up in a cloot
a wus feart o ye fer ye ir a haird man tae dail wi
ye tak whut daesnae belang tae ye an ye hairvest whut ye hinnae plantit
tha king cum bak wi ye uisless guidfernaethin frae yer ain mooth ye hae condemned yersel
sae ye thocht a wus a haird man did ye takkin whut didnae belang tae me an hairvestin whut a haednae plantit
weel ye cud hae put ma siller intae tha bank hoo cum ye didnae
then whaniver a cum bak it cud hae made me a wee bit o intrest wi that tha king toul thaim that wur stannin roon aboot tak his coin frae him an gie it tae him that haes tha ten

but the saed tae him loard shair he haes ten coin saed tha king all tell ye this iverie yin that haes wull be gien mair an whaiver haes little or naethin even whut he haes wull be taen awa frae him but as fer thaim that wur agin me an wudnae hae me fer king bring thaim here tae me an kill thaim fornent me efter tellin thaim aa this jesus went on aheid alang tha road up tae jerusalem
an whaniver he wus cum near til bethphage an bethanie nixt tha hill caad tha moont o olives he sent on twa o his follaers sayin tae thaim awa intae thon clachan fornent iz
whan yis git thair yell fin a cowlt tyed up that naebodie haes iver sut on
lowse its raip an bring it til me
if onie yin axes yis hoo cum yis ir lowsin tha cowlt jist tell thaim tha loard haes need o it noo tha twa that went fun it jist as the haed bin toul
an as the wur lowsin tha cowlt tha yins it belanged tae axt thaim whut ir ye daein lowsin that cowlt
saed tha twa tha loard haes want o it an the brocht it tae jesus
an pittin thair claes on tha cowlts bak the tuk houl o it tae jesus got on
wi that as jesus made his wye alang tha fowk spreed thair claes doon afore him on tha pad

an whaniver he wus cumin nearhan tha pad doon frae tha moont o olives his follaers stairtit shoutin oot wi joy tha hale lock o thaim praisin god fer aa tha miracles the haed saen an cryin oot blisst is tha king that cums in tha name o tha loard

peace in heiven abain an glorie in tha heichest an some o tha pharisees amang tha thrang saed tae jesus maister scoul yer follaers an tell thaim tae quit it but he cum bak wi this am tellin yis if they ir quait een tha stanes thairsels wull cry oot jesus wus cumin near tae jerusalem noo an whan he saa tha citie he begun tae greet an he saed och if ye onlie haed hae knowed whut wud bring ye peace tha day but na ye didnae an noo its hid frae yer een
fer tha time wull cum whan thaim thats agin ye wull big dykes aa roon ye an fence ye in frae aa sides
yell be flettent intae tha grun an aa yer fowk alang wi ye
thell no lea yin stane on anither fer ye didnae ken tha day that god cum tae ye
an yinst he got tae jerusalem whut jesus daen wus this he went strecht intae tha hoose o god an he begun reddin oot tha dailers frae tha coortyaird
it is writ doon he saed tae thaim that ma hoose wull be a hoose o prayer
but yous hae turnt it intae a den o robbers an efter that iverie day jesus stairtit lairnin tha fowk in tha hoose o god

an tha heid preeshts an tha maisters o tha laa alang wi tha heidyins amang tha fowk the wur oot tae get rid o him but the cud dae naethin aboot it fer he wusnae iver on his lane an aa tha fowk hung on his iverie wurd

on yin o thaim days as jesus wus lairnin tha fowk that wur in tha hoose o god an praichin tha guid news tha heid preeshts tha maisters o tha laa an tha elders amang tha fowk cum up tae him an saed tell iz this bi whut thortie ir ye daein these things an wha gien ye it
an he cum bak wi a hae a question tae ax you as weel
jist tell me this jhones baptisin wus it frae heiven or wus it jist a notion o man
an the taakt aboot it tae yin anither an saed if we gie tha answer frae heiven he wull say hoo cum yis didnae believe him then
but if we say frae men aa tha fowk wull clod iz wi stanes fer the hae nae doot that jhone wus a proaphit sae the toul him that the cudnae tell whar jhones baptisin haed cum frae

an jesus saed tae thaim then all no be tellin yis ether bi whut thortie a dae these things he turnt tae tha fowk an toul thaim this parable thair wus this man plantit a vineyaird an he set it tae a wheen o tenantfairmers tae rin afore gaun awa fer a lang time tae anither kintrie
an whaniver hairst time cum roon he sent a sarvin man tae tha fairmers tae get a taste o tha fruit frae thaim but the bate up tha sarvin man an chaist him awa empiehannit
sae he sent anither sarvin man but the creesht him as weel wur wile baad til him an sent him awa wi naethin
agane he sent anither yin oot an the hurt him an flung him oot tae
then tha laird o tha vineyaird saed whut wull a dae
a know all senn ma ain sinn that a love
the ir shair tae hae regaird fer him but whaniver tha tenantfairmers saen tha sinn the taakt it ower an saed this is tha boy that wull git aa this here whan his da dees
if we kill him aa this cud be oors sae the put him oot o tha vineyaird an killt him
an jesus axt whut dae yis think tha laird wull dae on thaim noo
all tell yis
he wull cum an desthroy thaim fairmers an set tha vineyaird tae ithers

whan tha fowk listenin tae jesus heerd this the saed this shud niver cum aboot but jesus lukt at thaim strecht in tha ee an axt whut then is tha mainin o this scripture tha verie stane tha masons turnt doon is noo tha coarner stane
aa tha yins that faa ower thon stane wull be smesht tae bits an whaiver it faas on wull be grun tae pooder
tha maisters o tha laa an tha heid preeshts lukt fer a wye tae tak houl o him thair an then fer the kent he haed spauk agin thaim in this parable
but the wur feart o whut tha fowk wud dae
keepin a quare clase ee on him the sent yins that lut on the wur honest fer tae spie on him
the wur hopin tae ketch him oot in sumthin he saed fer the wantit tae be able tae han him ower tae tha pooer o tha roman guviner
these yins that wur spiein on jesus axt him sayin maister ye taak an taich whut is richt
ye dinnae mak o yin mair ner tha ither but ye taich gods wye an tha truith
tell iz is it richt fer iz tae pye tex tae caesar or no
but jesus saa throu thaim an he saed dinnae try me oot let me see a denarius
noo whase name an laikness is on it
its caesars the saed
then gie caesar whut belangs tae caesar saed he an gie god whut belangs tae god
that settelt thaim
the wurnae able tae ketch him oot afore tha fowk fer whut he haed saed
an the haed tae be quait fer his answer flebbergestit thaim
an sartin sadducees thaim that say thair isnae onie risin frae tha deid the cum an pit a question tae jesus
maister the saed moses writ doon fer iz that if a mans brither dees an leas a guidwife wi nae weans then he maun merrie tha weeda an hae childer fer his deid brither
noo whut if thair wus seiven brithers
tha oulest gets merriet an he dees wioot haein onie weans
sae tha saicont brither he merries tha weeda an he dees as weel
still nae weans
an tha thurd merries hir an in tha same wye aa seiven brithers merries hir an dees leain nae femlie ava
an in tha enn tha wumman she deed as weel
noo at tha risin frae tha deid whase guidwife wull she be fer she wus merriet on tha hale seiven o thaim
jesus cum bak wi this men an weemen o this warl get merriet
but thaim that ir coontit fit tae be pairt o tha risin frae tha deid an tha nixt warl thair wull be nae mair merryin fer thaim
thell be laik tha angels an the cannae dee the ir childer o god an childer o tha risin frae tha deid

but even moses whaniver he writ aboot tha burnin bush he showed that tha deid rises agane fer he caas tha loard tha god o abraham an tha god o isaac an tha god o jacob lang efter the wur aa deid hes no tha god o tha deid hes tha god o tha leevin fer iveriebodies leevin in gods een
an some o tha maisters o tha laa saed weel spauk maister but naebodie ava wud dar ax him onie mair questions
then jesus axt thaim hoo can the mak oot that tha messiah is tha sinn o davit
fer davit hissel says in tha buik o psaums tha loard saed tae ma loard sit doon at ma richt han tae a mak o yer enemies a stool fer unner yer fit
sae davit caas tha messiah ma loard
hoo can he be his sinn then

whaniver aa tha fowk wus listenin jesus saed tae his follaers dinnae tak heed o tha maisters o tha laa fer the ir fand o paradin aboot in fancie robes an the love fowk tae touch thair keps tae thaim in tha mairket places
the laik tae hae tha best saits in tha meetin hooses an tae be at tha tap table at faists
the halp thairsels bi daein weeda weemen oot o aa the hae
an the mak lang screeds o prayers jist fer show
but yis can be shair it wull gang waur wi thaim on tha day o reckonin
jesus lukt up an saa tha weelaff fowk pittin thair offerins intae tha kist in tha hoose o god
then he saen this puir weeda wumman drappin in twa pennies
am tellin yis tha truith qo he this puir weeda haes gien mair ner onie o tha rest o thaim
aa these yins hae onlie gien a pittance oot o thair pruch intae tha kist but this weeda puir an aa that she is haes gien aa she haed tae leeve on
some o thaimins that wur wi him wur taakin amang thairsels aboot tha wye tha hoose o god wus aa daen up wi its bricht bonnie stanes an coastlie ornyments gien in bi fowk
but jesus saed tha day wull cum whan aa these stanes wull be tummelt doon an no yin stane wull be left abain tha ither
an the axt him maister whans aa this fer happenin then
an wull we hae onie sign o it cumin
jesus cum bak wi this tak heed an dinnae let oniebodie lead yis aglee fer monies a yin wull cum in ma name sayin a be tha christ or tha time is cum
dinnae pye thaim onie heed
whan yis hear tell o wars an fechtin dinnae be feart fer sitch things maun cum aboot furst but tha enn is no near jist yit
then he saed tae thaim nations wull mak war on ither nations an kingdoms wull rise up agin ither kingdoms
thair wull be michtie irthquakes dirths an plagues in differnt pairts an fleysum sichts an pooerfu signs frae heiven
hooaniver afore aa this cums aboot thell be takkin houl o yis persecutin yis an turnin yis in at tha meetin hooses
thell clod yis intae jail an dreg yis up afore kings an guviners jist fer bein ma follaers
thisll be yer chaunce tae wutness tae yin an aa
